 456+ 8BE2 CB 10       >			   rl  b
 457+ 8BE4 CB 27                                sla     a
 458+ 8BE6 38 03                                jr      c,.DoneCalc
 459+ 8BE8 C3 D8 8B                             jp      .UpscaleLoop
 460+ 8BEB              .DoneCalc               ShiftDERight1
 460+ 8BEB CB 3A       >			   srl d
 460+ 8BED CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 461+ 8BEF                                      ShiftHLRight1
 461+ 8BEF CB 3C       >			   srl h
 461+ 8BF1 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 462+ 8BF3                                      ShiftBCRight1
 462+ 8BF3 CB 38       >			   srl b
 462+ 8BF5 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 463+ 8BF7 5A           .NowSetResultInLowByte: ld      e,d
 464+ 8BF8 6C                                   ld      l,h
 465+ 8BF9 48                                   ld      c,b
 466+ 8BFA FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 467+ 8BFC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 468+ 8BFE 47                                   ld      b,a
 469+ 8BFF FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 470+ 8C01 CB 27                                sla     a
 471+ 8C03 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 472+ 8C05 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 473+ 8C07 67                                   ld      h,a
 474+ 8C08 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 475+ 8C0A CB 27                                sla     a
 476+ 8C0C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 477+ 8C0E 57                                   ld      d,a
 478+ 8C0F C9                                   ret
 479+ 8C10 3E 01        .Setto1:                ld      a,1
 480+ 8C12 4F                                   ld      c,a
 481+ 8C13 5F                                   ld      e,a
 482+ 8C14 6F                                   ld      l,a
 483+ 8C15 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 484+ 8C17 CB 27                                sla     a
 485+ 8C19 CB 27                                sla     a
 486+ 8C1B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 487+ 8C1D B3                                   or      e
 488+ 8C1E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 489+ 8C1F C9                                   ret
 490+ 8C20
 491+ 8C20
 492+ 8C20              UpdateCompassSun:       MMUSelectSun
 492+ 8C20 ED 91 56 53 >                     nextreg SunMMU,            BankSunData
 493+ 8C24 CD 4E 8B                             call    ScaleSunPos                 ; get as 7 bit signed
 494+ 8C27 C5 E5 D5                             push    bc,,hl,,de                  ; +3 save to stack Y, X and Z scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 495+ 8C2A 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 496+ 8C2B 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 497+ 8C2C ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 498+ 8C2E 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 499+ 8C30 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 500+ 8C31 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 501+ 8C32 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 502+ 8C34 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 503+ 8C35 D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; +2 get Z saved from stack so now stack contains Y Z X
 504+ 8C36 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 505+ 8C37 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 506+ 8C39 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; de = x^2 + y^2 + z^2
 507+ 8C3A 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ; .
 508+ 8C3B EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 509+ 8C3C CD D0 AD                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 510+ 8C3F                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 511+ 8C3F 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 512+ 8C40 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 513+ 8C42 E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; +1 get back hl x scaled
 514+ 8C43 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 515+ 8C44 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 516+ 8C46 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 517+ 8C47 C5                                   push    bc                          ; +2 save bc temporarily as it will get altered
 518+ 8C48 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 519+ 8C49 CD 35 B3                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 520+ 8C4C 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 521+ 8C4D                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 521+ 8C4D 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 521+ 8C4F 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 521+ 8C51 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 521+ 8C52 19          >                        add     hl,de
 521+ 8C53 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 521+ 8C54 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 521+ 8C55 19          >                        add     hl,de
 521+ 8C56 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 522+ 8C57 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 523+ 8C58 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; +1 retrieve bc
 524+ 8C59 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; if result in h was 0 then done
 525+ 8C5B 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                ; in case we end up with - 0
 526+ 8C5D CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 527+ 8C5F 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 528+ 8C61 ED 44                                neg
 529+ 8C63 DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 530+ 8C65 FD 55        .NormaliseY:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 531+ 8C67 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; +0 hl y scaled
 532+ 8C68 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 533+ 8C69 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 534+ 8C6B 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 535+ 8C6C C5                                   push    bc                          ; +1 save sign to stack
 536+ 8C6D 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit signed z
 537+ 8C6E CD 35 B3                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; .
 538+ 8C71 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 539+ 8C72                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 539+ 8C72 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 539+ 8C74 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 539+ 8C76 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 539+ 8C77 19          >                        add     hl,de
 539+ 8C78 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 539+ 8C79 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 539+ 8C7A 19          >                        add     hl,de
 539+ 8C7B 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 540+ 8C7C 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 541+ 8C7D C1                                   pop     bc                          ; +1 retrieve sign
 542+ 8C7E FE 00                                cp      0
 543+ 8C80 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormY                ; in case we end up with - 0
 544+ 8C82 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 545+ 8C84 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormY
 546+ 8C86 ED 44                                neg                                 ;
 547+ 8C88 47           .DoneNormY:             ld      b,a                         ; result from Y
 548+ 8C89 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; x = saved X
 549+ 8C8B              .SetSprite:             MMUSelectSpriteBank
 549+ 8C8B ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 550+ 8C8F CD 05 E1                             call    compass_sun_move
 551+ 8C92 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
 552+ 8C94 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 553+ 8C96 20 04                                jr      nz,.SunBehind
 554+ 8C98 CD 8C E1     .SunInfront:            call    show_compass_sun_infront
 555+ 8C9B C9                                   ret
 556+ 8C9C CD 97 E1     .SunBehind:             call    show_compass_sun_behind
 557+ 8C9F C9                                   ret
 558+ 8CA0
 559+ 8CA0
 560+ 8CA0              UpdateCompassPlanet:    MMUSelectPlanet
 560+ 8CA0 ED 91 56 54 >                     nextreg PlanetMMU,         BankPlanetData
 561+ 8CA4 CD 01 8B                             call    ScalePlanetPos              ; get as 7 bit signed
 562+ 8CA7 C5 E5 D5                             push    bc,,hl,,de                  ; save to stack Y, Z, X and copy of X scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 563+ 8CAA 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 564+ 8CAB 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 565+ 8CAC ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 566+ 8CAE 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 567+ 8CB0 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 568+ 8CB1 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 569+ 8CB2 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 570+ 8CB4 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 571+ 8CB5 D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; get saved from stack 2
 572+ 8CB6 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 573+ 8CB7 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 574+ 8CB9 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; hl = x^2 + y^2 + z^2
 575+ 8CBA 09                                   add     hl,bc
 576+ 8CBB EB                                   ex      de,hl
 577+ 8CBC CD D0 AD                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 578+ 8CBF                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 579+ 8CBF 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 580+ 8CC0 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 581+ 8CC2 E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; hl x scaled
 582+ 8CC3 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 583+ 8CC4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 584+ 8CC6 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 585+ 8CC7 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 586+ 8CC8 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 587+ 8CC9 CD 35 B3                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 588+ 8CCC 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 589+ 8CCD                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 589+ 8CCD 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 589+ 8CCF 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 589+ 8CD1 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 589+ 8CD2 19          >                        add     hl,de
 589+ 8CD3 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 589+ 8CD4 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 589+ 8CD5 19          >                        add     hl,de
 589+ 8CD6 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 590+ 8CD7 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 591+ 8CD8 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 592+ 8CD9 FE 00                                cp      0
 593+ 8CDB 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                ; in case we end up with - 0
 594+ 8CDD CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 595+ 8CDF 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 596+ 8CE1 ED 44                                neg
 597+ 8CE3 DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 598+ 8CE5 FD 55        .NormaliseY:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 599+ 8CE7 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; hl y scaled
 600+ 8CE8 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 601+ 8CE9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 602+ 8CEB 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 603+ 8CEC C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 604+ 8CED 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit signed z
 605+ 8CEE CD 35 B3                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; .
 606+ 8CF1 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 607+ 8CF2                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 607+ 8CF2 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 607+ 8CF4 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 607+ 8CF6 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 607+ 8CF7 19          >                        add     hl,de
 607+ 8CF8 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 607+ 8CF9 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 607+ 8CFA 19          >                        add     hl,de
 607+ 8CFB 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 608+ 8CFC 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 609+ 8CFD C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 610+ 8CFE FE 00                                cp      0
 611+ 8D00 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormY                 ; in case we end up with - 0
 612+ 8D02 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 613+ 8D04 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormY
 614+ 8D06 ED 44                                neg                                 ;
 615+ 8D08 47           .DoneNormY:             ld      b,a                         ; result from Y
 616+ 8D09 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; x = saved X
 617+ 8D0B              .SetSprite:             MMUSelectSpriteBank
 617+ 8D0B ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 618+ 8D0F CD 17 E1                             call    compass_station_move

 621+ 8D16 20 04                                jr      nz,.PlanetBehind
 622+ 8D18 CD A2 E1     .PlanetInfront:         call    show_compass_station_infront

 628+ 8D4F CB 15       >                        rl      l
 628+ 8D51 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 629+ 8D53 3A 12 C0     .IsItInRange:           ld      a,(PBnKxsgn)                ; if the high byte is not
 630+ 8D56 21 15 C0                             ld      hl,PBnKysgn                 ; a sign only
 631+ 8D59 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; then its too far away
 632+ 8D5A 21 18 C0                             ld      hl,PBnKzsgn                 ; for the scanner to draw
 633+ 8D5D B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; so rely on the compass
 634+ 8D5E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ;
 635+ 8D60 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
 636+ 8D61 2A 16 C0     .ItsInRange:            ld      hl,(PBnKzlo)                ; we will get unsigned values

 639+ 8D6C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 640+ 8D6D B2                                   or      d
 641+ 8D6E B0                                   or      b
 642+ 8D6F E6 C0                                and     %11000000
 643+ 8D71 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if distance Hi > 64 on any ccord- off screen
 644+ 8D72 3A 12 C0     .MakeX2Compliment:      ld      a,(PBnKxsgn)
 645+ 8D75 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 646+ 8D77 28 04                                jr      z,.absXHi
 647+ 8D79                                      NegD
 647+ 8D79 7A          >                    ld      a,d
 647+ 8D7A ED 44       >                    neg
 647+ 8D7C 57          >                    ld      d,a
 648+ 8D7D 7A           .absXHi:                ld      a,d
 649+ 8D7E C6 80                                add     ScannerX
 650+ 8D80 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; store adjusted X in ixh
 651+ 8D82 CB 3C        .ProcessZCoord:         srl     h
 652+ 8D84 CB 3C                                srl     h
 653+ 8D86 3A 18 C0     .MakeZ2Compliment:      ld      a,(PBnKzsgn)
 654+ 8D89 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 655+ 8D8B 28 04                                jr      z,.absZHi
 656+ 8D8D                                      NegH
 656+ 8D8D 7C          >                    ld      a,h
 656+ 8D8E ED 44       >                    neg
 656+ 8D90 67          >                    ld      h,a
 657+ 8D91 3E AB        .absZHi:                ld      a,ScannerY
 658+ 8D93 94                                   sub     h
 659+ 8D94 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; make iyh adjusted Z = row on screen
 660+ 8D96 CB 38        .ProcessStickLength:    srl     b                           ; divide b by 2
 661+ 8D98 20 0B                                jr      nz,.StickHasLength
 662+ 8D9A FD 7C        .Stick0Length:          ld      a,iyh                       ; abs stick end is row - length
 663+ 8D9C FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 664+ 8D9E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 664+ 8D9E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 665+ 8DA2 C3 CD 8D                             jp      .NoStick

 667+ 8DA8 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 668+ 8DAA 28 04                                jr      z,.absYHi
 669+ 8DAC                                      NegB
 669+ 8DAC 78          >                    ld      a,b
 669+ 8DAD ED 44       >                    neg
 669+ 8DAF 47          >                    ld      b,a
 670+ 8DB0 FD 7C        .absYHi:                ld      a,iyh
 671+ 8DB2 90           .SetStickPos:           sub     b
 672+ 8DB3                                      JumpIfALTNusng ScannerBottom, .StickOnScreen
 672+ 8DB3 FE BE       >                        cp      ScannerBottom
 672+ 8DB5 DA BA 8D    >                        jp		c, .StickOnScreen

 674+ 8DBA FD 6F        .StickOnScreen:         ld      iyl,a                       ; iyh is again stick end point
 675+ 8DBC DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a
 676+ 8DBE FD 44                                ld      b,iyh                       ; from row
 677+ 8DC0 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; from col
 678+ 8DC2 FD 55                                ld      d,iyl                       ; to row
 679+ 8DC4 1E B4                                ld      e,L2SunScanner
 680+ 8DC6                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 680+ 8DC6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 681+ 8DCA CD 35 E3                             call    l2_draw_vert_line_to

 683+ 8DCF DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; col
 684+ 8DD1 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright

 783+ 8EBD 21 18 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKzsgn                 ; for the scanner to draw
 784+ 8EC0 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; so rely on the compass
 785+ 8EC1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ;
 786+ 8EC3 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
 787+ 8EC4 2A 16 C0     .ItsInRange:            ld      hl,(SBnKzlo)                ; we will get unsigned values
 788+ 8EC7 ED 5B 10 C0                          ld      de,(SBnKxlo)
 789+ 8ECB ED 4B 13 C0                          ld      bc,(SBnKylo)
 790+ 8ECF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 791+ 8ED0 B2                                   or      d
 792+ 8ED1 B0                                   or      b
 793+ 8ED2 E6 C0                                and     %11000000
 794+ 8ED4 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if distance Hi > 64 on any ccord- off screen
 795+ 8ED5 3A 12 C0     .MakeX2Compliment:      ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 796+ 8ED8 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 797+ 8EDA 28 04                                jr      z,.absXHi
 798+ 8EDC                                      NegD
 798+ 8EDC 7A          >                    ld      a,d
 798+ 8EDD ED 44       >                    neg
 798+ 8EDF 57          >                    ld      d,a
 799+ 8EE0 7A           .absXHi:                ld      a,d
 800+ 8EE1 C6 80                                add     ScannerX
 801+ 8EE3 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; store adjusted X in ixh
 802+ 8EE5 CB 3C        .ProcessZCoord:         srl     h
 803+ 8EE7 CB 3C                                srl     h
 804+ 8EE9 3A 18 C0     .MakeZ2Compliment:      ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
 805+ 8EEC CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 806+ 8EEE 28 04                                jr      z,.absZHi
 807+ 8EF0                                      NegH
 807+ 8EF0 7C          >                    ld      a,h
 807+ 8EF1 ED 44       >                    neg
 807+ 8EF3 67          >                    ld      h,a
 808+ 8EF4 3E AB        .absZHi:                ld      a,ScannerY
 809+ 8EF6 94                                   sub     h
 810+ 8EF7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; make iyh adjusted Z = row on screen
 811+ 8EF9 CB 38        .ProcessStickLength:    srl     b                           ; divide b by 2
 812+ 8EFB 20 0B                                jr      nz,.StickHasLength
 813+ 8EFD FD 7C        .Stick0Length:          ld      a,iyh                       ; abs stick end is row - length
 814+ 8EFF FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 815+ 8F01                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 815+ 8F01 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 816+ 8F05 C3 30 8F                             jp      .NoStick
 817+ 8F08 3A 15 C0     .StickHasLength:        ld      a,(SBnKysgn)                ; if b  =  0 then no line
 818+ 8F0B CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 819+ 8F0D 28 04                                jr      z,.absYHi
 820+ 8F0F                                      NegB
 820+ 8F0F 78          >                    ld      a,b
 820+ 8F10 ED 44       >                    neg
 820+ 8F12 47          >                    ld      b,a
 821+ 8F13 FD 7C        .absYHi:                ld      a,iyh
 822+ 8F15 90           .SetStickPos:           sub     b
 823+ 8F16                                      JumpIfALTNusng ScannerBottom, .StickOnScreen
 823+ 8F16 FE BE       >                        cp      ScannerBottom
 823+ 8F18 DA 1D 8F    >                        jp		c, .StickOnScreen
 824+ 8F1B 3E BE                                ld      a,ScannerBottom
 825+ 8F1D FD 6F        .StickOnScreen:         ld      iyl,a                       ; iyh is again stick end point
 826+ 8F1F DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a
 827+ 8F21 FD 44                                ld      b,iyh                       ; from row
 828+ 8F23 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; from col
 829+ 8F25 FD 55                                ld      d,iyl                       ; to row
 830+ 8F27 1E B4                                ld      e,L2SunScanner
 831+ 8F29                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 831+ 8F29 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 832+ 8F2D CD 35 E3                             call    l2_draw_vert_line_to
 833+ 8F30 FD 45        .NoStick:               ld      b,iyl                       ; row
 834+ 8F32 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; col
 835+ 8F34 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 836+ 8F36 CD 29 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel

1053  90AB                          INCLUDE "./Tables/message_queue.asm"
# file opened: ./Tables/message_queue.asm
   1+ 90AB
   2+ 90AB
   3+ 90AB              ResetMessageQueue:      ZeroA
   3+ 90AB AF          >                        xor a
   4+ 90AC 32 B4 9B                             ld      (MessageCount),a
   5+ 90AF 32 B5 9B                             ld      (MessageCurrent),a
   6+ 90B2 21 B8 9B                             ld      hl,MessageQueue
   7+ 90B5 11 B6 9B                             ld      de,MessageIndex
   8+ 90B8 06 05                                ld      b,5
   9+ 90BA 7D           .ClearMessageIndexs:    ld      a,l                                 ; Wipe out the indexes to all the data
  10+ 90BB 12                                   ld      (de),a                              ;
  11+ 90BC 13                                   inc     de                                  ;
  12+ 90BD 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
  13+ 90BE 12                                   ld      (de),a                              ;
  14+ 90BF 13                                   inc     de                                  ;
  15+ 90C0 3E 21                                ld      a,MESSAGESIZE                       ;
  16+ 90C2 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ;
  17+ 90C4 10 F4                                djnz    .ClearMessageIndexs                 ;
  18+ 90C6 21 B8 9B     .ClearText:             ld      hl,MessageQueue
  19+ 90C9 11 AA 00                             ld      de,(MAXMESSAGES * MESSAGESIZE) + MAXMESSAGES    ; MessageQueue + MessageTimeout
  20+ 90CC 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  21+ 90CE CD 88 98                             call	memfill_dma
  22+ 90D1 C9                                   ret
  23+ 90D2
  24+ 90D2              ; Message to enqeue is a string held at DE that must be terminated in \0
  25+ 90D2              ;                                       IYH = timer for message
  26+ 90D2 3A B4 9B     EnqueMessage:           ld      a,(MessageCount)                    ; Maximum message count check
  27+ 90D5                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    MAXMESSAGES            ; we do not enque if queue is full
  27+ 90D5 FE 05       >                        cp    MAXMESSAGES
  27+ 90D7 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  28+ 90D8 3C                                   inc     a
  29+ 90D9 32 B4 9B                             ld      (MessageCount),a                    ; get ready for next message
  30+ 90DC 4F           .AddMessage:            ld      c,a
  31+ 90DD 3A B5 9B                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)                  ; a = current message id + count + 1
  32+ 90E0 81                                   add     c                                   ;
  33+ 90E1                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToAdd     ; a = a modulus 5 (note we can only hit 5 messages
  33+ 90E1 FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  33+ 90E3 DA E8 90    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToAdd
  34+ 90E6 D6 05        .CircularQueue:         sub     MAXMESSAGES                         ; so only need 1 cycle of modulus
  35+ 90E8 21 5D 9C     .ReadyToAdd:            ld      hl,MessageTimeout                   ; write out message display time
  36+ 90EB ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; as some may be brief messages
  37+ 90ED 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
  38+ 90EE FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                               ;
  39+ 90F0 77                                   ld      (hl),a                              ;
  40+ 90F1 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back index
  41+ 90F2 21 B6 9B                             ld      hl,MessageIndex
  42+ 90F5                                      HLEquAddrAtHLPlusA                          ; hl = target location for message
  42+ 90F5 CB 27       >                    sla         a
  42+ 90F7 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  42+ 90F9 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
  42+ 90FA 23          >                    inc         hl
  42+ 90FB 66          >                    ld          h,(hl)
  42+ 90FC 6F          >                    ld          l,a
  43+ 90FD EB                                   ex      de,hl                               ; de = destination, hl = message
  44+ 90FE                                      ldCopyTextAtHLtoDE                          ; copy over text as we have done the rest
  44+ 90FE 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld      a,(hl)
  44+ 90FF 12          >                        ld      (de),a
  44+ 9100 FE 00       >                        cp      0
  44+ 9102 CA 09 91    >                        jp      z,.DoneCopy
  44+ 9105 23          >                        inc     hl
  44+ 9106 13          >                        inc     de
  44+ 9107 18 F5       >                        jr      .CopyLoop
  44+ 9109             >.DoneCopy:
  45+ 9109 C9                                   ret
  46+ 910A
  47+ 910A 3A B5 9B     UpdateMessageTimer:     ld      a,(MessageCurrent)
  48+ 910D 21 5D 9C                             ld      hl,MessageTimeout
  49+ 9110 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  50+ 9112 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  51+ 9113 3D                                   dec     a
  52+ 9114 28 02                                jr      z,.UpdateQueue
  53+ 9116 77           .UpdateTimer            ld      (hl),a
  54+ 9117 C9                                   ret
  55+ 9118 77           .UpdateQueue:           ld      (hl),a
  56+ 9119 21 B4 9B                             ld      hl,MessageCount
  57+ 911C 35                                   dec     (hl)
  58+ 911D 3A B5 9B                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)
  59+ 9120 23                                   inc     hl
  60+ 9121                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToUpdate
  60+ 9121 FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  60+ 9123 DA 27 91    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToUpdate
  61+ 9126              .CircularQueue:         ZeroA
  61+ 9126 AF          >                        xor a
  62+ 9127 32 B5 9B     .ReadyToUpdate          ld      (MessageCurrent),a
  63+ 912A C9                                   ret
  64+ 912B
  65+ 912B 3A B4 9B     DisplayCurrentMessage:  ld      a,(MessageCount)
  66+ 912E                                      ReturnIfAIsZero

  66+ 912F C8          >                        ret     z

  68+ 9133 21 B6 9B                             ld      hl,MessageIndex
  69+ 9136                                      HLEquAddrAtHLPlusA

   1+ 9218              ; LaserTypeTable
   2+ 9218              ; laser type = id of laser
   3+ 9218              ; laser pulse pause = time before next pulse
   4+ 9218              ; laser pulse duration = time laser is on per shot
   5+ 9218              ; laser damage output
   6+ 9218              ;
   7+ 9218              ; LaserType
   8+ 9218              ; LaserPulseRate                          ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
   9+ 9218              ; LaserPulseOnTime                        ; cycles laser is on for
  10+ 9218              ; LaserPulseOffTime                       ; cycles laser is off for
  11+ 9218              ; LaserPulseRest                          ; time before pulse count resets to 0 (i.e cooldown)
  12+ 9218              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
  13+ 9218              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
  14+ 9218              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
  15+ 9218              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage

1136  93C4
1137  93C4                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 93C4              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 93C4              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 93C4              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 93C4              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 93C4 ED 4B 83 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 93C8 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 93C9 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 93CA 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 93CB 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 93CC A8                   xor     b
  11+ 93CD E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 93CF DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 93D1 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 93D2 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 93D4 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 93D5 E5           		push	hl
  17+ 93D6 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 93D8 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 93D9 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 93DA CD F1 AC     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 93DD 22 C9 98     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 93E0 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 93E2 32 D0 98     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 93E5 E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 93E6              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 93E6 ED 4B 85 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 93EA 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 93EB 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 93EC 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 93ED 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 93EE 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 93EF A8                   xor     b
  33+ 93F0 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 93F2 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 93F4 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 93F5 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 93F7 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 93F8 E5           		push	hl
  39+ 93F9 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 93FB 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 93FC 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 93FD CD F1 AC     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 9400 22 CB 98     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 9403 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 9405 32 CF 98     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 9408 E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 9409              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 9409 ED 4B 87 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 940D 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 940E 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 940F 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 9410 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 9411 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 9412 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 9413 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 9415 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 9417 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 9418 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 941A 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 941B 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 941D 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 941E 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 941F CD F1 AC     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 9422 22 CD 98     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 9425 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 9427 32 D1 98     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 942A              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 942A 2A C9 98     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 942D ED 5B CB 98  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 9431 ED 4B CF 98  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 9435              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 9435 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 9436 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 9437 AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 9438 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 9439 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 943A CD 12 B3     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 943D 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 943E 3A D1 98     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 9441 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 9442 ED 5B CD 98  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 9446 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 9447 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 9449 CD 12 B3     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 944C C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 944D              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 944D
  88+ 944D              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 944D              ;...X cell
  90+ 944D 21 56 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 9450 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 9453 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 9454 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 9455 B0           		or		b
  95+ 9456 32 8A C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 9459 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 945A 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 945D              ;...Y cell
  99+ 945D 21 5E C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 9460 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 9463 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 9464 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 9465              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 9465 B0           		or		b
 105+ 9466 32 8C C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 9469 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 946A 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 946D              ;...Z cell
 109+ 946D 21 66 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 9470 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 9473 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 9474 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 9475              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 9475 B0           		or		b
 115+ 9476 32 8E C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 9479 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 947A 32 8D C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 947D C9                   ret
 119+ 947E
 120+ 947E              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 947E              ;...X cell
 122+ 947E 21 56 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 9481 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 9484 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 9485 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 9486 B0           		or		b
 127+ 9487 32 8A C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 948A 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 948B 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 948E              ;...Y cell
 131+ 948E 21 5E C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 132+ 9491 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 133+ 9494 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 9495 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 9496              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 9496 B0           		or		b
 137+ 9497 32 8C C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 949A 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 949B 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 140+ 949E              ;...Z cell
 141+ 949E 21 66 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 142+ 94A1 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 143+ 94A4 47           		ld		b,a
 144+ 94A5 7C                   ld		a,h
 145+ 94A6              ;		ld		a,l
 146+ 94A6 B0           		or		b
 147+ 94A7 32 8E C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 94AA 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 149+ 94AB 32 8D C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 150+ 94AE C9                   ret
 151+ 94AF
 152+ 94AF              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 94AF              ;...X cell
 154+ 94AF 21 3E C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 94B2 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 94B5 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 94B6 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 94B7 B0           		or		b
 159+ 94B8 32 8A C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 94BB 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 94BC 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 94BF              ;...Y cell
 163+ 94BF 21 44 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 164+ 94C2 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 165+ 94C5 47           		ld		b,a
 166+ 94C6 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 94C7              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 94C7 B0           		or		b
 169+ 94C8 32 8C C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 170+ 94CB 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 171+ 94CC 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 172+ 94CF              ;...Z cell
 173+ 94CF 21 4A C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 174+ 94D2 CD C4 93             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 175+ 94D5 47           		ld		b,a
 176+ 94D6 7C                   ld		a,h
 177+ 94D7              ;		ld		a,l
 178+ 94D7 B0           		or		b
 179+ 94D8 32 8E C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 180+ 94DB 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 181+ 94DC 32 8D C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 182+ 94DF C9                   ret

1140  9558                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 9558 06 09        ScaleXX16Matrix197:     ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   2+ 955A 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   3+ 955C 21 3E C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   4+ 955F 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   5+ 9560 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
   6+ 9561 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
   7+ 9562 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
   8+ 9563 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
   9+ 9564 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  10+ 9566 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  11+ 9568                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  11+ 9568 CB 23       >			   sla e
  11+ 956A CB 12       >			   rl  d
  12+ 956C 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  13+ 956D C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  14+ 956E E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  15+ 956F CD D3 AE                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  16+ 9572 E1                                   pop		hl
  17+ 9573 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  18+ 9574 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  19+ 9575 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  20+ 9576                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  21+ 9576                                  ;    and     $80
  22+ 9576 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  23+ 9578 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  24+ 9579 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  25+ 957A 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  26+ 957B 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  27+ 957D C9                                   ret
  28+ 957E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
1141  957E
1142  957E                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 957E              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 957E              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 957E              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 957E              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 957E
   6+ 957E              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 957E              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 957E
   9+ 957E EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 957F CD A9 A1                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 9582 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 9583 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 9585 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 9586 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 9588 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 9589 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 958A EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 958B CD A9 A1                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 958E EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 958F 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 9590 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 9592 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 9593 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 9594 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 9595 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 9596 CD A9 A1                             call    doRND
  27+ 9599 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 959A F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 959C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 959D 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 959E E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 95A0 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  41+ 95AC EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 95AD CD A9 A1                             call    doRND
  43+ 95B0 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 95B1 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 95B3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 95B4 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 95B5 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 95B7 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 95B9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 95BA 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 95BB C9                                   ret

  54+ 95BD CD A9 A1                             call    doRND
