 100+ 9602
 101+ 9602              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 9602 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 9603 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 9605 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 9606 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 9607                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 9607 FA 35 96    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 960A 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 960B B2                                   or      d
 109+ 960C                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 960C FA 16 96    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 960F B7                                   or      a
 111+ 9610 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 9612                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 9612 FA 29 96    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 9615 C9                                   ret
 114+ 9616 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 9617 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 9619 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 961A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 961B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 961D 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 961E B7                                   or      a
 121+ 961F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 9621                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 9621 FA 29 96    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 9624 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 9625 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 9627 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 9628 C9                                   ret
 127+ 9629              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 9629 AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 962A 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 962B 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 962C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 962D 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 962E 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 962F 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 9630 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 9632 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 9633 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 9634 C9                                   ret
 133+ 9635 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 9636 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 9637 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 9639 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 963A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 963B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 963D 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 963E 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 963F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 9640 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 9641 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 9642 C9                                   ret
 145+ 9643
 146+ 9643 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 9644 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 9646 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 9647 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 9648                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 9648 FA 60 96    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 964B 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 964C B2                                   or      d
 153+ 964D                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 964D FA 52 96    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9650 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 9651 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9652 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 9653 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 9655 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 9656 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 9657 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 9659 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 965A 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 965B 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 965D B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 965E 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 965F C9                                   ret
 167+ 9660 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 9661 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 9663 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 9664 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 9665 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 9667 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 9668 B7                                   or      a
 174+ 9669 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 966B 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 966D 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 966E B4                                   or      h
 178+ 966F 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9670 C9                                   ret
 180+ 9671              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 9671 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 9672 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 9673 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 9674 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 9675 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 9676 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 9677 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 9678 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 967A B4                                   or      h
 184+ 967B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 967C C9                                   ret
 186+ 967D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 967D 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 967F 21 F2 9E                             ld      hl,varDust
 189+ 9682 CD 7E 95     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 190+ 9685 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 191+ 9687 C9                                   ret
 192+ 9688              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 193+ 9688 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 194+ 968A 21 F2 9E                             ld      hl,varDust
 195+ 968D CD BC 95     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 196+ 9690 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 197+ 9692 C9                                   ret
 198+ 9693              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ 9693 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 200+ 9695 FD 21 F2 9E                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 201+ 9699 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 202+ 969A FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 203+ 969D 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 204+ 969E 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 205+ 96A0 3A 94 9C                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 206+ 96A3                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 206+ 96A3 A7          >                        and     a
 206+ 96A4 C2 A8 96    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 207+ 96A7 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 208+ 96A8 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 209+ 96A9 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 210+ 96AB CD 85 AF                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 211+ 96AE                                      ShiftHLRight1
 211+ 96AE CB 3C       >			   srl h
 211+ 96B0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 212+ 96B2                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 212+ 96B2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 212+ 96B4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 213+ 96B6 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 214+ 96B7 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 215+ 96B9 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 216+ 96BB FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 216+ 96BF 66 05
 217+ 96C1 ED 5B 95 9C                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 218+ 96C5 CD 02 96                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 219+ 96C8                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 219+ 96C8 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 219+ 96CA C2 1F 98    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 220+ 96CD FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 220+ 96D1 74 05
 221+ 96D3 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 221+ 96D7 66 01
 222+ 96D9 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 223+ 96DA E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 224+ 96DC 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 225+ 96DD DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 226+ 96DF ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 227+ 96E1 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 228+ 96E2 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 229+ 96E4 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 230+ 96E5 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 231+ 96E6 CD 43 96                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 232+ 96E9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 233+ 96EA E6 7F                                and     $7F
 234+ 96EC                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 234+ 96EC FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 234+ 96EE D2 1F 98    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 235+ 96F1 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 235+ 96F5 74 01
 236+ 96F7 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 236+ 96FB 66 03
 237+ 96FD 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 238+ 96FE E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 239+ 9700 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 240+ 9701 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 241+ 9703 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 242+ 9705 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 243+ 9706 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 244+ 9708 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 245+ 9709 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 246+ 970A CD 43 96                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 247+ 970D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 248+ 970E E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 9710                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 249+ 9710 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 249+ 9712 D2 1F 98    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 250+ 9715 7C                                   ld      a,h
 251+ 9716 E6 80                                and     $80
 252+ 9718 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 253+ 971A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 254+ 971B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 254+ 971B FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 254+ 971D D2 1F 98    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 255+ 9720 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 255+ 9724 74 03
 256+ 9726              ; Now roll
 257+ 9726              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 258+ 9726 2A AF 9B     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 259+ 9729 7D                                   ld      a,l
 260+ 972A FE 00                                cp      0
 261+ 972C 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 262+ 972E                                      ;break
 263+ 972E                                      ;ld      a,$80
 264+ 972E                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 265+ 972E E5                                   push    hl
 266+ 972F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 267+ 9730 E6 80                                and     $80
 268+ 9732 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 269+ 9733 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 270+ 9734 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 271+ 9737 5F                                   ld      e,a
 272+ 9738 E6 80                                and     $80
 273+ 973A 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 274+ 973B 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 275+ 973C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 276+ 973E 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 277+ 973F ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 278+ 9741 79                                   ld      a,c
 279+ 9742 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 280+ 9743 B2                                   or      d
 281+ 9744 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 282+ 9745 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 282+ 9749 66 01
 283+ 974B CD 02 96                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 284+ 974E FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 284+ 9752 74 01
 285+ 9754              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 286+ 9754              .YRoll:                 ;break
 287+ 9754 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 288+ 9755 7C                                   ld      a,h
 289+ 9756 E6 80                                and     $80
 290+ 9758 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 291+ 9759 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 292+ 975A FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 293+ 975D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 294+ 975E E6 80                                and     $80
 295+ 9760 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 296+ 9761 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 297+ 9762 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 298+ 9764 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 299+ 9765 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 300+ 9767 79                                   ld      a,c
 301+ 9768 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 302+ 9769 B2                                   or      d
 303+ 976A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 304+ 976B FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 304+ 976F 66 03
 305+ 9771 CD 43 96                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 306+ 9774 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 306+ 9778 74 03
 307+ 977A 3A A2 9B     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 308+ 977D FE 00                                cp      0
 309+ 977F 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 310+ 9781              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 311+ 9781 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 312+ 9782 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 313+ 9785 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 314+ 9786 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 315+ 9788 5F                                   ld      e,a
 316+ 9789 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 317+ 978B                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 317+ 978B CB 23       >			   sla e
 317+ 978D CB 12       >			   rl  d
 318+ 978F 3A A4 9B                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 319+ 9792 B2                                   or      d
 320+ 9793 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 321+ 9794 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 321+ 9798 66 03
 322+ 979A CD 43 96                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 323+ 979D FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 323+ 97A1 74 03
 324+ 97A3              ; now work out screen pos
 325+ 97A3              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 326+ 97A3              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 327+ 97A3              ;        pop     de
 328+ 97A3               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 329+ 97A3                                      ;pop     de
 330+ 97A3              .NoPitch:
 331+ 97A3 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 332+ 97A6 6F                                   ld      l,a
 333+ 97A7 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 334+ 97A9                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 334+ 97A9 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 334+ 97AB C2 B4 97    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 335+ 97AE C6 80                                add     a,$80
 336+ 97B0 4F                                   ld      c,a
 337+ 97B1 C3 B9 97                             jp      StarDoneX
 338+ 97B4 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 339+ 97B5 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 340+ 97B7 90                                   sub     b
 341+ 97B8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 97B9 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 343+ 97BC 6F                                   ld      l,a
 344+ 97BD E6 7F                                and     $7F
 345+ 97BF                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 345+ 97BF CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 345+ 97C1 C2 CA 97    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 346+ 97C4 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 347+ 97C6 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 97C7 C3 CF 97                             jp      StarDoneY
 349+ 97CA 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 350+ 97CB 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 351+ 97CD 90                                   sub     b
 352+ 97CE 47                                   ld      b,a
 353+ 97CF 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 354+ 97D1 C5                                   push    bc
 355+ 97D2              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 355+ 97D2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 355+ 97D6 CD 29 E1       call    l2_plot_pixel
 356+ 97D9 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 357+ 97DC C1                                   pop    bc
 358+ 97DD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 358+ 97DD FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 358+ 97DF D2 0F 98    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 359+ 97E2 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 360+ 97E4 0C                                   inc     c
 361+ 97E5 C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 97E6                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 97E6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 97EA CD 29 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 97ED FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 97F0 C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 97F1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 97F1 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 366+ 97F3 D2 0F 98    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 97F6 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 97F8 04                                   inc     b
 369+ 97F9 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 97FA                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 97FA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 370+ 97FE CD 29 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 371+ 9801 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 372+ 9804 C1                                   pop    bc
 373+ 9805 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 374+ 9807 0D                                   dec     c
 375+ 9808                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 375+ 9808 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 375+ 980C CD 29 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 376+ 980F C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 377+ 9810 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 378+ 9812 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 379+ 9813 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 380+ 9817 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 381+ 9818 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 382+ 981A 05                                   dec     b
 383+ 981B C2 99 96                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 384+ 981E C9                                   ret
 385+ 981F C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 386+ 9820 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 387+ 9822 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 388+ 9823 CD 7E 95                             call    InitStarAtHL
 389+ 9826 C3 10 98                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 390+ 9829              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391+ 9829 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 392+ 982C FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 393+ 982F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 394+ 9830 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 395+ 9832 47                                   ld      b,a
 396+ 9833 CD EA AE                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 397+ 9836 7D                                   ld      a,l
 398+ 9837                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 398+ 9837 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 398+ 9839 C2 44 98    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 399+ 983C              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 400+ 983C 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 401+ 983E 26 00                                ld          h,0
 402+ 9840 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 403+ 9841 C3 4B 98                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 404+ 9844              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 405+ 9844 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 406+ 9846 26 00                                ld          h,0
 407+ 9848                                      ClearCarryFlag
 407+ 9848 B7          >                        or a
 408+ 9849 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 409+ 984B              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 410+ 984B 7D                                   ld          a,l
 411+ 984C 32 4A 9F                             ld          (varStarX),a
 412+ 984F C9                                   ret
 413+ 9850
 414+ 9850 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 415+ 9853 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 416+ 9856 6F                                   ld          l,a
 417+ 9857 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 418+ 9859 47                                   ld          b,a
 419+ 985A CD EA AE                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 420+ 985D 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 421+ 985E                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 421+ 985E CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 421+ 9860 C2 6B 98    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 422+ 9863                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 423+ 9863 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 424+ 9865                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 9865 B7          >                        or a
 425+ 9866 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 426+ 9868 C3 70 98                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 427+ 986B              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 428+ 986B 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 429+ 986D 26 00                                ld          h,0
 430+ 986F 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 431+ 9870              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 432+ 9870 7D                                   ld          a,l
 433+ 9871 32 4B 9F                             ld          (varStarY),a
 434+ 9874 C9                                   ret
 435+ 9875
 436+ 9875

   1+ 9875
   2+ 9875 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 9876 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 987A 7D
   4+ 987B 75 98        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 987D 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 987F 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 9882 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 9884 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9888              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9888
  11+ 9888              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9888              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9888              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9888 32 75 98     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 988B              .set_target:
  16+ 988B 22 82 98     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 988E              .set_length:
  18+ 988E ED 53 7D 98  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 9892              .write_dma:
  20+ 9892 21 76 98     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 9895 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 9897 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9899 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 989B C9           	ret
  25+ 989C
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1150  989C                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 989C
   2+ 989C 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 98A0 7D
   3+ 98A1 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 98A3 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 98A5 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 98A8 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 98AA 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 98AE              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 98AE
  10+ 98AE              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 98AE              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 98AE              .set_target:
  13+ 98AE 22 A8 98     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 98B1              .set_source:
  15+ 98B1 ED 53 A1 98  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 98B5              .set_length:
  17+ 98B5 ED 43 A3 98  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 98B9              .write_dma:
  19+ 98B9 21 9C 98     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 98BC 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 98BE 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 98C0 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 98C2 C9           	ret
  24+ 98C3
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

1156  98CD 00 00        XX12PVarResult3		DW 0
1157  98CF 00           XX12PVarSign2		DB 0
1158  98D0 00           XX12PVarSign1		DB 0								; Note reversed so BC can do a little endian fetch

 182+ 98D2 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 98FA              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 98FA 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 9902 FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 9906 EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 990A              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 990A              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 990A              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 990A E1 98 E2 98  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 990E E3 98 E4 98
 189+ 9912 EC 98
 190+ 9914 EB 98 DC 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 9918 D7 98 DD 98
 190+ 991C D8 98
 191+ 991E F5 98 E0 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 9922 DA 98 DF 98
 191+ 9926 DE 98
 192+ 9928 EE 98 D2 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 992C F8 98 F4 98
 192+ 9930 F3 98
 193+ 9932 DB 98 F1 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 193+ 9936 F9 98 D6 98
 193+ 993A D5 98
 194+ 993C E5 98 EA 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 194+ 9940 E9 98 E8 98
 194+ 9944 E7 98
 195+ 9946 D3 98 EC 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 195+ 994A F9 98 F1 98
 195+ 994E D9 98
 196+ 9950 EF 98 E6 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 196+ 9954 DC 98 D7 98
 196+ 9958 DA 98
 197+ 995A EF 98 F8 98                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_PressedYes   ,Keys+KeyCode_PressedNo
 198+ 995E
 199+ 995E 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 199+ 9962 56
 200+ 9963 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 200+ 9967 47
 201+ 9968 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 201+ 996C 54
 202+ 996D 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 202+ 9971 35
 203+ 9972 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 203+ 9976 36
 204+ 9977 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 204+ 997B 59
 205+ 997C 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 205+ 9980 48
 206+ 9981 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 206+ 9985 42
 207+ 9986
 208+ 9986              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 9986              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 9986              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 9986              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 219+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 220+ 9986              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 221+ 9986              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 222+ 9986              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 9986              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 224+ 9986              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 225+ 9986              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 226+ 9986              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod
 227+ 9986              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 228+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 229+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 230+ 9986              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 231+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 9986              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 9986              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 9986              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 9986              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 9986              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 9986              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 242+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 243+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 244+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 245+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 246+ 9986              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 247+ 9986              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 248+ 9986              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 249+ 9986              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 250+ 9986
 251+ 9986
 252+ 9986              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 253+ 9986 ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 254+ 9986 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 255+ 9986 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 256+ 9986                                      ENDM
 257+ 9986
 258+ 9986 21 D2 98     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 259+ 9989 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 260+ 998C 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 261+ 998E CD 88 98                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 262+ 9991 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 263+ 9992
 264+ 9992
 265+ 9992
 266+ 9992 DD 21 FA 98  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 267+ 9996 21 02 99                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 268+ 9999 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 269+ 999B 11 D2 98                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 270+ 999E 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 271+ 999F DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 272+ 99A1 DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 273+ 99A4 DD 23                                inc     ix
 274+ 99A6 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 275+ 99A7 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 276+ 99A9 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 277+ 99AA CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 278+ 99AC 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 279+ 99AE FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 280+ 99B0                                      ZeroA
 280+ 99B0 AF          >                        xor a
 281+ 99B1 C3 BE 99                             jp      .SetKey
 282+ 99B4 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 283+ 99B6 FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 284+ 99B8 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 285+ 99B9 FE 02                                cp      2
 286+ 99BB 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 287+ 99BD 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 288+ 99BE 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 289+ 99BF FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 290+ 99C1 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 291+ 99C2 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 292+ 99C4 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 293+ 99C5 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 294+ 99C7 C9                                   ret
 295+ 99C8
 296+ 99C8
 297+ 99C8
 298+ 99C8              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 299+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 300+ 99C8 ~                                    add     hl,a
 301+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 302+ 99C8 ~                                    inc     hl
 303+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 99C8                                      ENDM
 305+ 99C8
 306+ 99C8              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 307+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 308+ 99C8 ~                                    add     hl,a
 309+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 310+ 99C8 ~                                    inc     hl
 311+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 312+ 99C8 ~                                    ld      l,a
 313+ 99C8                                      ENDM
 314+ 99C8
 315+ 99C8
 316+ 99C8              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 317+ 99C8              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 318+ 99C8              ;;old debug code
 319+ 99C8              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 320+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 321+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 322+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 323+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 324+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 325+ 99C8              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 326+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        rra
 327+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 328+ 99C8              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 329+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 330+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 331+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 332+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 333+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 334+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 335+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 336+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 337+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 338+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 339+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 340+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 341+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 342+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ret
 343+ 99C8              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 344+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 345+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 346+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 347+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 348+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 349+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 350+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 351+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 352+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 353+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 354+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 355+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 356+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 357+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ret
 358+ 99C8              ;;old debug code
 359+ 99C8              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 360+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 361+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 362+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 363+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 364+ 99C8              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 365+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 366+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 367+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 368+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ret
 369+ 99C8              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 370+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 371+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 372+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 373+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ret
 374+ 99C8              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 375+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 376+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 377+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 378+ 99C8              ;;old debug code                        ret
 379+ 99C8              ;;old debug code
 380+ 99C8
 381+ 99C8
 382+ 99C8              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 383+ 99C8              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 384+ 99C8              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 385+ 99C8              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 386+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 387+ 99C8              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 388+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 389+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 390+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 391+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 392+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 393+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        ret
 394+ 99C8              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 395+ 99C8              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 396+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 397+ 99C8              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 398+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 399+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 400+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 401+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 402+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 403+ 99C8              ;;;;;;                        ret
 404+ 99C8
 405+ 99C8              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 406+ 99C8              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 406+ 99C8 21 0A 99    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 406+ 99CB ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 406+ 99CD 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 406+ 99CE 23          >                        inc     hl
 406+ 99CF 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 406+ 99D0 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 407+ 99D1 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 408+ 99D2 C9                                   ret
 409+ 99D3
 410+ 99D3              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 411+ 99D3              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 411+ 99D3 21 0A 99    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 99D6 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 99D8 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 99D9 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 99DA 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 99DB 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 99DC 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 413+ 99DE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 414+ 99DF C9                                   ret
 415+ 99E0
 416+ 99E0              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 416+ 99E0 21 0A 99    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 416+ 99E3 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 416+ 99E5 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 416+ 99E6 23          >                        inc     hl
 416+ 99E7 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 416+ 99E8 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 417+ 99E9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 418+ 99EA FE 00                                cp      0
 419+ 99EC C9                                   ret
 420+ 99ED
 421+ 99ED              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 422+ 99ED              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 422+ 99ED 21 0A 99    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 422+ 99F0 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 422+ 99F2 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 422+ 99F3 23          >                        inc     hl
 422+ 99F4 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 422+ 99F5 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 423+ 99F6 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 424+ 99F7 FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 425+ 99F9 C9                                   ret
 426+ 99FA
 427+ 99FA              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 428+ 99FA              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 428+ 99FA 21 0A 99    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 428+ 99FD ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 428+ 99FF 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 428+ 9A00 23          >                        inc     hl
 428+ 9A01 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 428+ 9A02 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 429+ 9A03 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 430+ 9A04 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 431+ 9A06 C9                                   ret
 432+ 9A07
 433+ 9A07              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 434+ 9A07 21 D2 98     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 9A0A 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 436+ 9A0D 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 437+ 9A0F ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 438+ 9A11 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 439+ 9A13                                      SetAFalse
 439+ 9A13 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 440+ 9A15 C9                                   ret
 441+ 9A16 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 442+ 9A18 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 443+ 9A19 C9                                   ret
 444+ 9A1A
 445+ 9A1A 21 D2 98     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 446+ 9A1D 06 28                                ld      b,40
 447+ 9A1F 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 448+ 9A21 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 449+ 9A22 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 450+ 9A24 C2 2E 9A                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 451+ 9A27 23                                   inc     hl
 452+ 9A28 0C                                   inc     c
 453+ 9A29 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 454+ 9A2B                                      SetAFalse
 454+ 9A2B 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 9A2D C9                                   ret
 456+ 9A2E 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 457+ 9A2F C9                                   ret
 458+ 9A30
 459+ 9A30
 460+ 9A30 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 461+ 9A4E 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 462+ 9A4F 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 463+ 9A50 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 464+ 9A51 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 465+ 9A52              InputLimit              EQU 20
 466+ 9A52
 467+ 9A52 21 30 9A     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 468+ 9A55 3A 4F 9A                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 469+ 9A58 FE 00                                    cp      0
 470+ 9A5A 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 471+ 9A5C 4F                                       ld      c,a
 472+ 9A5D 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 473+ 9A5F ED B0                                    ldir
 474+ 9A61 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 475+ 9A63 12                                       ld      (de),a
 476+ 9A64 C9                                       ret
 477+ 9A65
 478+ 9A65 AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 479+ 9A66 32 4F 9A                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 9A69                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 480+ 9A69 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 480+ 9A6B 32 50 9A    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 481+ 9A6E                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 481+ 9A6E 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 481+ 9A70 32 51 9A    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 482+ 9A73 21 30 9A                             ld      hl,InputString
 483+ 9A76 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 484+ 9A78 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 485+ 9A79 23                                   inc     hl
 486+ 9A7A 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 487+ 9A7C C9                                   ret
 488+ 9A7D
 489+ 9A7D              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 489+ 9A7D 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 489+ 9A7F 32 51 9A    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 490+ 9A82 CD 07 9A                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 491+ 9A85 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 492+ 9A87 C8                                   ret     z
 493+ 9A88 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 494+ 9A89 3A 4F 9A                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 495+ 9A8C FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 496+ 9A8E 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 497+ 9A90 21 5E 99                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 498+ 9A93 79                                   ld      a,c
 499+ 9A94 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 500+ 9A96 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 501+ 9A97 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 502+ 9A99 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 503+ 9A9B              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 504+ 9A9B FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 505+ 9A9D 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 506+ 9A9F FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 507+ 9AA1 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 508+ 9AA3 FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 509+ 9AA5 C9                                   ret
 510+ 9AA6 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 511+ 9AA7 3A 4F 9A                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 512+ 9AAA 4F                                   ld      c,a
 513+ 9AAB 21 30 9A                             ld      hl,InputString
 514+ 9AAE ED 31                                add     hl,a
 515+ 9AB0 78                                   ld      a,b
 516+ 9AB1 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 517+ 9AB2 79                                   ld      a,c
 518+ 9AB3 21 4F 9A                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 519+ 9AB6 34                                   inc     (hl)
 520+ 9AB7                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 520+ 9AB7 AF          >                        xor     a
 520+ 9AB8 32 51 9A    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 521+ 9ABB C9                                   ret
 522+ 9ABC 3A 4F 9A     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 523+ 9ABF 21 30 9A                             ld      hl,InputString
 524+ 9AC2 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 525+ 9AC4                                      ZeroA
 525+ 9AC4 AF          >                        xor a
 526+ 9AC5 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 527+ 9AC6                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 527+ 9AC6 AF          >                        xor     a
 527+ 9AC7 32 50 9A    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 528+ 9ACA                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 528+ 9ACA AF          >                        xor     a
 528+ 9ACB 32 51 9A    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 529+ 9ACE CD 86 99                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 530+ 9AD1 C9                                   ret
 531+ 9AD2 3A 4F 9A     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 532+ 9AD5 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 533+ 9AD7 C8                                   ret     z
 534+ 9AD8 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 535+ 9AD9 32 4F 9A                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 536+ 9ADC 21 30 9A                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 537+ 9ADF ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 538+ 9AE1                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 538+ 9AE1 AF          >                        xor a
 539+ 9AE2 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 540+ 9AE3                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 540+ 9AE3 AF          >                        xor     a
 540+ 9AE4 32 51 9A    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 541+ 9AE7 C9                                   ret
 542+ 9AE8
 543+ 9AE8 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 544+ 9AE9 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 545+ 9AEC 3A A3 9C                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 546+ 9AEF E6 FC                                and     $FC
 547+ 9AF1 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 548+ 9AF3 2A 18 99     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)

 550+ 9AF7                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 550+ 9AF7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 550+ 9AF8 CA 06 9B    >                        jp	    z, ScanDiveKey
 551+ 9AFB 3A 84 9D                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 552+ 9AFE F6 80                                or      $80

 557+ 9B0A                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey

 557+ 9B0B CA 3C 9B    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 558+ 9B0E 3A 84 9D                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 559+ 9B11 F6 40                                or      $40
 560+ 9B13 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 561+ 9B16 C3 3C 9B                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 562+ 9B19 2A 54 99     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 563+ 9B1C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 564+ 9B1D                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 564+ 9B1D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 564+ 9B1E CA 2C 9B    >                        jp	    z, ScanCursorDownKey
 565+ 9B21 3A 84 9D                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 566+ 9B24 F6 80                                or      $80
 567+ 9B26 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 568+ 9B29 C3 3C 9B                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 569+ 9B2C 2A 56 99     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 570+ 9B2F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 571+ 9B30                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 571+ 9B30 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 571+ 9B31 CA 3C 9B    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 572+ 9B34 3A 84 9D                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 573+ 9B37 F6 40                                or      $40
 574+ 9B39 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 575+ 9B3C 2A 12 99     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 576+ 9B3F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 577+ 9B40                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 577+ 9B40 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 577+ 9B41 CA 4D 9B    >                        jp	    z, ScanRightKey
 578+ 9B44 3A 84 9D                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 579+ 9B47 F6 20                                or      $20
 580+ 9B49 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 581+ 9B4C C9                                   ret

 583+ 9B50 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 584+ 9B51                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 584+ 9B51 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 584+ 9B52 CA 5E 9B    >                        jp	    z, ScanHomeKey

 586+ 9B58 F6 10                                or      $10
 587+ 9B5A 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 588+ 9B5D C9                                   ret

 591+ 9B62                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 591+ 9B62 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags

 594+ 9B6B 32 84 9D                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a

 598+ 9B74 C8          >                        ret     z

 331+ 9DAF              ; Working Data
 332+ 9DAF
 333+ 9DAF              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 334+ 9DAF              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 335+ 9DAF              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 336+ 9DAF              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 337+ 9DAF              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 338+ 9DAF              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 339+ 9DAF              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 340+ 9DAF              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 341+ 9DAF              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 342+ 9DAF              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 343+ 9DAF              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 344+ 9DAF              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 345+ 9DAF              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 346+ 9DAF              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 347+ 9DAF
 348+ 9DAF
 349+ 9DAF
 350+ 9DAF              ; 0b00 is start address of data to save
 351+ 9DAF              ; Now MissionData VarTP					DB	0				; 0358 TP? The Plan  \ mission uses lower 4 bits

 417+ 9FB5              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated

  48+ A107 70                                   ld      (hl),b
  49+ A108 C9                                   ret
  50+ A109
  51+ A109              ; Clears all except slot A, used when say restarting a space station post launch
  52+ A109 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a
  53+ A10A 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  54+ A10C 21 69 9D                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  55+ A10F 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2
  56+ A111 79           .fillLoop:              ld      a,c
  57+ A112 BA                                   cp      d
  58+ A113 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  59+ A115 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  60+ A117 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  61+ A118 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  62+ A119 23                                   inc     hl
  63+ A11A 10 F5                                djnz    .fillLoop
  64+ A11C C9                                   ret
  65+ A11D
  66+ A11D 21 69 9D     ClearSlotA:             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  67+ A120 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  68+ A122 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  69+ A124 3E 0C                                ld      a,UniverseSlotListSize  ; move to types
  70+ A126 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  71+ A128 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  72+ A12A C9                                   ret
  73+ A12B              ; Space Station will always be slot 0
  74+ A12B
  75+ A12B 21 76 9D     AreShipsPresent:        ld      hl,UniverseSlotType+1
  76+ A12E 06 0B                                ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize -1      ; ignore space station
  77+ A130 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)
  78+ A131 FE 00                                cp      ShipTypeNormal
  79+ A133                                      ClearCarryFlag
  79+ A133 B7          >                        or a
  80+ A134 C8                                   ret     z
  81+ A135 23                                   inc     hl
  82+ A136 10 F8                                djnz    .NextShip
  83+ A138                                      SetCarryFlag
  83+ A138 37          >                        scf
  84+ A139 C9                                   ret
  85+ A13A
  86+ A13A 21 69 9D     IsSpaceStationPresent:  ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  87+ A13D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  87+ A13D B7          >                        or a
  88+ A13E 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  89+ A13F                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation
  89+ A13F FE 02       >                        cp      ShipTypeStation
  89+ A141 C8          >                        ret     z
  90+ A142                                      SetCarryFlag
  90+ A142 37          >                        scf
  91+ A143 C9                                   ret
  92+ A144
  93+ A144 21 69 9D     GetTypeAtSlotA:         ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  94+ A147 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  95+ A149 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  96+ A14A C9                                   ret
  97+ A14B
  98+ A14B 21 6A 9D     IsPlanetOrSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList+1
  99+ A14E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 100+ A14F C9                                   ret
 101+ A150
 102+ A150 21 69 9D     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 103+ A153 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize
 104+ A155 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
 105+ A157 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
 106+ A158                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
 106+ A158 FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
 106+ A15A CA 63 A1    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
 107+ A15D 0C                                   inc     c
 108+ A15E 23                                   inc     hl
 109+ A15F 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
 110+ A161                                      SetCarryFlag
 110+ A161 37          >                        scf
 111+ A162 C9                                   ret
 112+ A163              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
 112+ A163 B7          >                        or a
 113+ A164 C9                                   ret
 114+ A165
 115+ A165
 116+ A165 CD 50 A1     FindNextFreeSlotInA:    call    FindNextFreeSlotInC
 117+ A168 79                                   ld      a,c
 118+ A169 C9                                   ret

  19+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserPulsePause         DS  4               ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
  20+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserPulseRest          DS  4               ; time before pulse count resets to 0
  21+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserDamageOutput       DS  4               ; amount of damage for a laser hit
  22+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserEnergyDrain        DS  4               ; amount of energy drained by cycle
  23+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserHeat               DS  4               ; amount of heat generated
  24+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserDurability         DS  4               ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on it unshielded will add random amount of damage
  25+ A18D              ; dont need as static from table LaserDurabilityAmount   DS  4               ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
  26+ A18D
