1169  A1A8
1170  A1A8                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ A1A8              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ A1A8              doRND2:
   3+ A1A8 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ A1A9              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ A1A9              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ A1A9 3A 8E 9B     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ A1AC CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ A1AE 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ A1AF 21 90 9B     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ A1B2 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ A1B3 32 8E 9B     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ A1B6 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ A1B7 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ A1B8 32 90 9B                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ A1BB 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ A1BC 3A 8F 9B                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ A1BF 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ A1C0 21 91 9B     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ A1C3 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ A1C4 32 8F 9B                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ A1C7 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ A1C8 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ A1C9 32 91 9B                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ A1CC 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ A1CD C9                                   ret
  26+ A1CE
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm
1171  A1CE                  INCLUDE "./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm
   1+ A1CE 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ A1D2 58 59 53 45
   1+ A1D6 45 44
   2+ A1D8 21 9A 9D     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ A1DB 11 84 9C                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ A1DE ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ A1E0 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ A1E2 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ A1E4 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ A1E6 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ A1E8 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ A1EA C9                                   ret
  11+ A1EB
  12+ A1EB 21 84 9C     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ A1EE 11 9A 9D                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ A1F1 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ A1F3
  16+ A1F3 21 9A 9D     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ A1F6 11 8E 9D                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ A1F9 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ A1FB
  20+ A1FB 21 8E 9D     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ A1FE 11 9A 9D                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ A201 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ A203
  24+ A203 21 8E 9D     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ A206 11 84 9C                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ A209 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ A20B
  28+ A20B 21 84 9C     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ A20E 11 8E 9D                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ A211 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ A213
  32+ A213              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ A213 CD 16 A2     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ A216              .NextStep:
  35+ A216 CD 19 A2     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ A219              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ A219 3A 84 9C     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ A21C B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ A21D 21 86 9C     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ A220 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ A221 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ A222 3A 85 9C     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ A225 21 87 9C     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ A228 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ A229 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ A22A 3A 86 9C     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ A22D 32 84 9C     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ A230 3A 87 9C     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ A233 32 85 9C     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ A236 3A 89 9C     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ A239 32 87 9C     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ A23C 3A 88 9C     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ A23F 32 86 9C     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ A242 B7           		or		a
  55+ A243 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ A244 21 86 9C     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ A247 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ A248 32 88 9C     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ A24B 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ A24C 21 87 9C     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ A24F 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ A250 32 89 9C     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ A253 C9           		ret
  64+ A254
  65+ A254              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ A254 CD 57 A2     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ A257              .NextStep:
  68+ A257 CD 5A A2     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ A25A              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ A25A              ; x = a + c
  71+ A25A 3A 8E 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ A25D B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ A25E 21 90 9D     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ A261 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ A262 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ A263              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ A263 3A 8F 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ A266 21 91 9D     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ A269 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ A26A 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ A26B 3A 90 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ A26E 32 8E 9D     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ A271 3A 91 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ A274 32 8F 9D     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ A277 3A 93 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ A27A 32 91 9D     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ A27D 3A 92 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ A280 32 90 9D     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ A283 B7           		or		a
  90+ A284 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ A285 21 90 9D     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ A288 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ A289 32 92 9D     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ A28C 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ A28D 21 91 9D     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ A290 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ A291 32 93 9D     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ A294 C9           		ret
  99+ A295
 100+ A295 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ A296 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ A297 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ A298
 104+ A298 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ A299 32 9D 9C                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ A29C 3A 85 9C     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ A29F 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ A2A0 3A A1 9D     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ A2A3 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ A2A4 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ A2A5 90                                   sub		b
 112+ A2A6 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ A2A8 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ A2AA ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ A2AC 32 97 A2     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ A2AF ED 5B 95 A2                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ A2B3 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ A2B4 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ A2B6 3A 87 9C     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ A2B9 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ A2BA 3A A0 9D                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ A2BD 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ A2BE 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ A2BF 90                                   sub		b
 125+ A2C0 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ A2C2 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ A2C4 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ A2C6 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ A2C7 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ A2C8 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ A2CA 3A 97 A2     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ A2CD 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ A2CE ED 43 95 A2                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ A2D2 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ A2D3 CD 0B A2                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ A2D6 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ A2D7 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ A2D8 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ A2D9 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ A2DA CD 13 A2     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ A2DD 3A 9D 9C                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ A2E0 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ A2E1 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ A2E3 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ A2E4 32 9D 9C                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ A2E7 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ A2E9
 148+ A2E9              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ A2E9 3A 8F 9D     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ A2EC E6 07        		and		7
 151+ A2EE 32 22 9D     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ A2F1 3A 90 9D     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ A2F4 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ A2F6 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ A2F8 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ A2FA CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ A2FC E6 07        		and		7
 158+ A2FE 32 23 9D     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ A301 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ A303 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ A305 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ A307              .Fedual:
 163+ A307 3A 22 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ A30A F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ A30C 32 22 9D     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ A30F              .CanBeRich:
 167+ A30F 3A 22 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ A312 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ A314 32 24 9D     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ A317 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ A318 3A 91 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ A31B E6 03        		and		3
 173+ A31D 80           		add		a,b
 174+ A31E 32 24 9D     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ A321 3A 23 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ A324 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ A326 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ A327 3A 24 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ A32A 80           		add		a,b
 180+ A32B 32 24 9D     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ A32E CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ A330 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ A332 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ A333 3A 22 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ A336 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ A337 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ A338 3A 23 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ A33B 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ A33C 32 25 9D     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ A33F 3A 22 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ A342 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ A344 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ A346 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ A347 3A 23 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ A34A C6 04        		add		4
 196+ A34C 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ A34D ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ A34F 3A 25 9D     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ A352 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ A353 ED 30        		mul
 201+ A355 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ A357 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ A359 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ A35B CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ A35D CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ A35F CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ A361 ED 53 27 9D  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ A365              .DoRadius:
 209+ A365 3A 91 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ A368 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ A369 3A 93 9D     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ A36C E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ A36E C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ A370 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ A371 ED 43 2B 9D  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ A375 C9           		ret
 217+ A376
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  34+ A4A6 31 A4 3A A4  RankingNameIdx		dw RankingName1,RankingName2,RankingName3,RankingName4,RankingName5,RankingName6,RankingName7,RankingName8,RankingName9,RankingName10,RankingName11
  34+ A4AA 4A A4 4F A4
  34+ A4AE 57 A4 65 A4
  34+ A4B2 6F A4 79 A4
  34+ A4B6 80 A4 93 A4
  34+ A4BA 9F A4
  35+ A4BC              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  36+ A4BC
  37+ A4BC
  38+ A4BC              getTableText:
  39+ A4BC              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ A4BC              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ A4BC D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ A4BD ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ A4BF ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ A4C1 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ A4C2 23           	inc		hl
  46+ A4C3 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ A4C4 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ A4C5 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ A4C6 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ A4C7
  51+ A4C7
  52+ A4C7              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ A4C7              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ A4C7              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ A4C7              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ A4C7              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ A4C7              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ A4C7              getRankIndex:
  59+ A4C7              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ A4C7              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ A4C7 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ A4C8 B3           	or		e
  63+ A4C9 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ A4CB C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ A4CC AF           	xor 	a
  66+ A4CD 21 1B A4     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ A4D0              .testLoop:
  68+ A4D0 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ A4D1 23           	inc		hl
  70+ A4D2 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ A4D3 E5           	push	hl
  72+ A4D4 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ A4D5 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ A4D6 CD C9 B0     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ A4D9 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ A4DB              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ A4DB E1           	pop		hl
  78+ A4DC 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ A4DD 23           	inc		hl
  80+ A4DE 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ A4DF 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ A4E1              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ A4E1 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ A4E2 C9           	ret
  85+ A4E3
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 178+ A964              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ A964              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ A964
 181+ A964              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A964              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A964              .CapLoop:
 184+ A964 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A965 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A966 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A968 C8           	ret		z
 188+ A969 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A96B 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A96D FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A96F 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A971              .LowerCase:
 193+ A971 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A973 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A974 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A976
 197+ A976              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A976 21 E7 A7     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A979 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A97B ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A97D D5           	push	de
 202+ A97E 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A97F 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A980 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A981 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A982 D1           	pop		de
 207+ A983 C9           	ret
 208+ A984
 209+ A984
 210+ A984              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A984              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A984 21 0D A9     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A987 CD BC A4     	call	getTableText
 214+ A98A 11 43 A9     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A98D              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A98D 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A98E FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A990 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A992 E5           	push	hl
 220+ A993 D5           	push	de
 221+ A994 21 E7 A7     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A997 CD BC A4     	call	getTableText
 223+ A99A D1           	pop		de
 224+ A99B              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A99B 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A99C FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A99E 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A9A0              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A9A0 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A9A1 13           	inc		de
 231+ A9A2 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A9A3 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A9A5              .AddSpace:
 234+ A9A5 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A9A7 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A9A8 13           	inc		de
 237+ A9A9 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A9AA 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A9AB 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A9AD              .ReadDone:
 241+ A9AD 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A9AE AF           	xor		a
 243+ A9AF 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A9B0 C9           	ret

 105+ AA4B              ;MorePage4:

 107+ AA4B              ;ExtraTokenCheck:

 110+ AA4B              ;	ld		b,a
 111+ AA4B              ;	ld		hl,varV

 115+ AA4B              ;
 116+ AA4B              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ AA4B              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ AA4B              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ AA4B              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ AA4B              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ AA4B              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ AA4B              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ AA4B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ AA4B              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ AA4B              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ AA4B              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ AA4B              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ AA4B              ;
 129+ AA4B              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ AA4B              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ AA4B              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ AA4B              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ AA4B              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ AA4B              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ AA4B              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ AA4B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ AA4B              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ AA4B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ AA4B              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ AA4B              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ AA4B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ AA4B              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ AA4B              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ AA4B              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ AA4B              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ AA4B              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ AA4B              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ AA4B              ;C8                      INY
 149+ AA4B              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ AA4B              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ AA4B              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ AA4B              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ AA4B              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ AA4B              ;98                      TYA
 156+ AA4B              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ AA4B              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ AA4B              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ AA4B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ AA4B              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ AA4B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ AA4B              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ AA4B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ AA4B              ;68                      PLA
 165+ AA4B              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ AA4B              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ AA4B              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ AA4B              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ AA4B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ AA4B              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ AA4B              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ AA4B              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ AA4B              ;
 174+ AA4B              ;
 175+ AA4B              ;
 176+ AA4B              ;
 177+ AA4B              ;
 178+ AA4B              ;
 179+ AA4B              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ AA4B              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ AA4B              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ AA4B              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ AA4B              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ AA4B              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ AA4B              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ AA4B              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ AA4B              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ AA4B              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ AA4B              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ AA4B              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ AA4B              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ AA4B              ;60                      RTS
 199+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ AA4B              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ AA4B              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ AA4B              ;60                      RTS
 204+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ AA4B              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ AA4B              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ AA4B              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ AA4B              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ AA4B              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ AA4B              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ AA4B              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ AA4B              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ AA4B              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ AA4B              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ AA4B              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ AA4B              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ AA4B              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ AA4B              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ AA4B              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ AA4B              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ AA4B              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ AA4B              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ AA4B              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ AA4B              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ AA4B              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ AA4B              ;
 227+ AA4B              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ AA4B              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ AA4B              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ AA4B              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ AA4B              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ AA4B              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ AA4B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ AA4B              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ AA4B              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ AA4B              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ AA4B              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ AA4B              ;
 239+ AA4B              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ AA4B              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ AA4B              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ AA4B              ;
 243+ AA4B              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ AA4B              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ AA4B              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ AA4B              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ AA4B              ;
 248+ AA4B              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ AA4B              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ AA4B              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ AA4B              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ AA4B              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ AA4B              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ AA4B              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ AA4B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ AA4B              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ AA4B              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ AA4B              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ AA4B              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ AA4B              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ AA4B              ;
 262+ AA4B              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ AA4B              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ AA4B              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ AA4B              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ AA4B              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ AA4B              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ AA4B              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ AA4B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ AA4B              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ AA4B              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ AA4B              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ AA4B              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ AA4B              ;
 275+ AA4B              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ AA4B              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ AA4B              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ AA4B              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ AA4B              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ AA4B              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ AA4B              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ AA4B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ AA4B              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ AA4B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ AA4B              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ AA4B              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ AA4B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ AA4B              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ AA4B              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ AA4B              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ AA4B              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ AA4B              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ AA4B              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ AA4B              ;C8                      INY
 295+ AA4B              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ AA4B              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ AA4B              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ AA4B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ AA4B              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ AA4B              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ AA4B              ;98                      TYA
 302+ AA4B              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ AA4B              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ AA4B              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ AA4B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ AA4B              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ AA4B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ AA4B              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ AA4B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ AA4B              ;68                      PLA
 311+ AA4B              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ AA4B              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ AA4B              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ AA4B              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ AA4B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ AA4B              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ AA4B              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ AA4B              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ AA4B              ;
 320+ AA4B              ;
 321+ AA4B              ;
# file closed: ./Tables/name_digrams.asm

   9+ AA5B CB 7C                                bit     7,h

   1+ AA64
   2+ AA64              ; HL(2sc) = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   3+ AA64 16 00        HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:  ld      d,0
   4+ AA66 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; set up DE = A
   5+ AA67 7C                                   ld      a,h
   6+ AA68 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   7+ AA6A 28 07                                jr      z,.HLPositive               ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
   8+ AA6C 67           .HLNegative:            ld      h,a                         ; hl = ABS (HL)
   9+ AA6D                                      NegHL                               ; hl = - hl
   9+ AA6D AF          >                    xor a
   9+ AA6E 95          >                    sub l
   9+ AA6F 6F          >                    ld l,a
   9+ AA70 9F          >                    sbc a,a
   9+ AA71 94          >                    sub h
   9+ AA72 67          >                    ld h,a
  10+ AA73              .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de
  10+ AA73 B7          >                        or a
  11+ AA74 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; aftert his hl will be 2's c
  12+ AA76 C9                                   ret
  13+ AA77
  14+ AA77 5F           HLEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:    ld      e,a
  15+ AA78 7C                                   ld      a,h
  16+ AA79 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  17+ AA7B 20 04                                jr      nz,.HLNegative              ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
  18+ AA7D 7B           .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
  19+ AA7E ED 31                                add     hl,a
  20+ AA80 C9                                   ret
  21+ AA81              .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
  21+ AA81 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  21+ AA82 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  21+ AA84 67          >                        ld      h,a
  22+ AA85                                      NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C
  22+ AA85 AF          >                    xor a
  22+ AA86 95          >                    sub l
  22+ AA87 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ AA88 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ AA89 94          >                    sub h
  22+ AA8A 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ AA8B 16 00                                ld      d,0
  24+ AA8D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  24+ AA8D B7          >                        or a
  25+ AA8E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now add a to -ve HL , add does not do 2's c
  26+ AA90 FA 98 AA                             jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
  27+ AA93                                      SetSignBit      h
  27+ AA93 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  27+ AA94 F6 80       >                        or      SignOnly8Bit
  27+ AA96 67          >                        ld      h,a
  28+ AA97 C9                                   ret
  29+ AA98              .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
  29+ AA98 AF          >                    xor a
  29+ AA99 95          >                    sub l
  29+ AA9A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  29+ AA9B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  29+ AA9C 94          >                    sub h
  29+ AA9D 67          >                    ld h,a
  30+ AA9E C9                                   ret

  34+ AA9F              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
  35+ AA9F 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
  36+ AAA0 5C                                   ld      e,h
  37+ AAA1 7C                                   ld      a,h
  38+ AAA2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ AAA4 67                                   ld      h,a
  40+ AAA5 7A                                   ld      a,d
  41+ AAA6 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  42+ AAA8 7B                                   ld      a,e
  43+ AAA9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ AAAB B4                                   or      h
  45+ AAAC C9                                   ret
  46+ AAAD              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  47+ AAAD 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  48+ AAAE 4F                                   ld      c,a
  49+ AAAF 78                                   ld      a,b
  50+ AAB0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  51+ AAB2 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  52+ AAB4 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  53+ AAB5 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  54+ AAB7 69                                   ld      l,c
  55+ AAB8                                      ClearCarryFlag
  55+ AAB8 B7          >                        or a
  56+ AAB9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  57+ AABB C9                                   ret
  58+ AABC 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  59+ AABD ED 31                                add hl,a
  60+ AABF C9                                   ret
  61+ AAC0              ;tested mathstestsun2
  62+ AAC0              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  63+ AAC0 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  64+ AAC1 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  65+ AAC2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  66+ AAC4 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  67+ AAC6 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  68+ AAC7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  69+ AAC9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  70+ AACB 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  71+ AACC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  72+ AACE 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  73+ AACF 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  74+ AAD0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  75+ AAD2 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  76+ AAD3 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  77+ AAD4 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  78+ AAD5 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  79+ AAD6 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  80+ AAD7 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  81+ AAD8 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  82+ AAD9 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  83+ AADA 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  84+ AADB FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  85+ AADD 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  86+ AADE C9                                   ret                         ; done
  87+ AADF 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  88+ AAE0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  89+ AAE2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  90+ AAE4 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  91+ AAE5 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  92+ AAE6 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  93+ AAE8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  94+ AAEA 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  95+ AAEB E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
  96+ AAEC 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
  97+ AAEE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  98+ AAF0 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  99+ AAF1 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 100+ AAF3 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 101+ AAF5 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 102+ AAF6                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 102+ AAF6 BD          >                        cp      l
 102+ AAF7 DA 01 AB    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 103+ AAFA 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 104+ AAFC              ; The same so its just zero
 105+ AAFC AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 106+ AAFD 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 107+ AAFE 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 108+ AAFF 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 109+ AB00 C9                                   ret                        ; .
 110+ AB01              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 111+ AB01 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 112+ AB02 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 113+ AB03 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 114+ AB04 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 115+ AB05 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 116+ AB06 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 117+ AB07 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 118+ AB08 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 119+ AB09 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 120+ AB0A FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 121+ AB0C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 122+ AB0E B2                                   or      d                  ;
 123+ AB0F 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 124+ AB10 C9                                   ret
 125+ AB11 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 126+ AB12 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 127+ AB13 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 128+ AB14 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 129+ AB15 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 130+ AB16 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 131+ AB17 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 132+ AB18 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 133+ AB19 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 134+ AB1A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 135+ AB1C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 136+ AB1E B2                                   or      d                  ;
 137+ AB1F 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 138+ AB20 C9                                   ret
 139+ AB21
 140+ AB21
 141+ AB21              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 142+ AB21 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 143+ AB22 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 144+ AB23 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 145+ AB24 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 146+ AB26 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 147+ AB28 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 148+ AB29 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 149+ AB2A ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 150+ AB2C D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 151+ AB2D 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 152+ AB2E EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 153+ AB2F A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 154+ AB30 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 155+ AB32 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 156+ AB33 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 157+ AB34
 158+ AB34
 159+ AB34
 160+ AB34              ; a = value to add
 161+ AB34              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 162+ AB34              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 163+ AB34              addINWKbasigned:
 164+ AB34 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 165+ AB37 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 166+ AB38 78           		ld		a,b
 167+ AB39 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 168+ AB3B 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 169+ AB3C E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 170+ AB3E 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 171+ AB3F 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 172+ AB40 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 173+ AB42              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 174+ AB42              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 175+ AB42              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 176+ AB42              addhlcsigned:
 177+ AB42 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 178+ AB43 23                   inc     hl
 179+ AB44 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 180+ AB45 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 181+ AB46 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 182+ AB47 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 183+ AB48 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 184+ AB49 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 185+ AB4B 28 2B                jr      z,.postivecalc
 186+ AB4D              .negativecalc:
 187+ AB4D 7C                   ld      a,h
 188+ AB4E E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 189+ AB50 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 190+ AB51 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 191+ AB53 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 192+ AB55 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 193+ AB57 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 194+ AB59 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 195+ AB5A 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 196+ AB5B E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 197+ AB5D DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 198+ AB5F F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 199+ AB61 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 200+ AB62 77                   ld      (hl),a
 201+ AB63 2B                   dec     hl
 202+ AB64 72                   ld      (hl),d
 203+ AB65 2B                   dec     hl
 204+ AB66 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 205+ AB67 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 206+ AB68 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 207+ AB69              .nocarry:
 208+ AB69                      NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 208+ AB69 AF          >                    xor a
 208+ AB6A 95          >                    sub l
 208+ AB6B 6F          >                    ld l,a
 208+ AB6C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 208+ AB6D 94          >                    sub h
 208+ AB6E 67          >                    ld h,a
 209+ AB6F B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 210+ AB70 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 211+ AB71 73                   ld      (hl),e
 212+ AB72 23                   inc     hl
 213+ AB73 72                   ld      (hl),d
 214+ AB74 23                   inc     hl
 215+ AB75 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 216+ AB76 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 217+ AB77 C9                   ret
 218+ AB78              .postivecalc:
 219+ AB78 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 220+ AB7A 06 00                ld      b,0
 221+ AB7C 19                   add     hl,de
 222+ AB7D EB                   ex      de,hl
 223+ AB7E DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 224+ AB80 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 225+ AB81 2B                   dec     hl
 226+ AB82 72                   ld      (hl),d
 227+ AB83 2B                   dec     hl
 228+ AB84 73                   ld      (hl),e
 229+ AB85 C9                   ret
 230+ AB86
 231+ AB86              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 232+ AB86              ;MVT1
 233+ AB86              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 234+ AB86              ;    A = sign bit => T
 235+ AB86              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 236+ AB86              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 237+ AB86              ;
 238+ AB86              ;        and h, 7F
 239+ AB86              ;        b = 0
 240+ AB86              ;        c = varS
 241+ AB86              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 242+ AB86              ;        retain carry
 243+ AB86              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 244+ AB86              ;        and 7F
 245+ AB86              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 246+ AB86              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 247+ AB86              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 248+ AB86              ;
 249+ AB86              ;    else
 250+ AB86              ;MV10.
 251+ AB86              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 252+ AB86              ;        or      sign bit
 253+ AB86
 254+ AB86
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm

   1+ AB86              ; Note its big endian
   2+ AB86 2A 6E A1     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ AB89 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ AB8A 22 6E A1                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ AB8D 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ AB90 2A 70 A1                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ AB93 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ AB95 22 70 A1                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ AB98 C9                                   ret
  10+ AB99
  11+ AB99 2A 6E A1     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ AB9C 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ AB9D B5                                   or      l
  14+ AB9E 2A 70 A1                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ ABA1 B4                                   or      h
  16+ ABA2 B5                                   or      l
  17+ ABA3 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ ABA4 B7                                   or      a
  19+ ABA5 2A 6E A1                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ ABA8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ ABAA 22 6E A1                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ ABAD 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ ABB0 2A 70 A1                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ ABB3 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ ABB5 22 70 A1                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ ABB8                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ ABB8 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ ABBA C2 BE AB    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ ABBD C9                                   ret
  28+ ABBE 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ ABC1 22 6E A1                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ ABC4 22 70 A1                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ ABC7 C9                                   ret

1182  ABC8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ ABC8              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ ABC8              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ ABC8 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ ABC9 E5                                   push hl
   5+ ABCA DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ ABCC 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ ABCE E5                                   push hl
   8+ ABCF AF                                   xor a
   9+ ABD0 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ ABD1 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ ABD2 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ ABD4 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ ABD6 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ ABD8 17                                   rla
  15+ ABD9 B9                                   cp c
  16+ ABDA 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ ABDC 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ ABDE ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ ABE0 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ ABE1 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ ABE3 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ ABE5 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ ABE6 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ ABE8 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ ABE9 2D                                   dec l
  26+ ABEA E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ ABEB 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ ABED D1                                   pop de
  29+ ABEE 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ ABEF DD E5                                push ix
  31+ ABF1 D1                                   pop de
  32+ ABF2 C9                                   ret
  33+ ABF3
  34+ ABF3 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ ABF5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ ABF7 CD C8 AB                             call    Div24by24
  37+ ABFA F5                                   push    af
  38+ ABFB FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ ABFD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ ABFF B1                                   or      c
  41+ AC00 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ AC01 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ AC02 C9                                   ret
  44+ AC03
  45+ AC03                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ AC03 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ AC05 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ AC06 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ AC08 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ AC0A 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ AC0B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ AC0D 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ AC0E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ AC10 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ AC12 CD C8 AB                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ AC15 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ AC17 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ AC19 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ AC1A FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ AC1C 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ AC1D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ AC1F C9                                   ret
  63+ AC20
  64+ AC20              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ AC20              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ AC20              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ AC20              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ AC20 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ AC21 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ AC23 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ AC25 3A 98 9C                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ AC28 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ AC29 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ AC2C 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ AC2D 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ AC2F CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ AC31 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ AC32 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ AC34 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ AC36 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ AC38 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ AC39 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ AC3A 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ AC3C 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ AC3D 32 99 9C                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ AC40 C9                                   ret
  87+ AC41
  88+ AC41
  89+ AC41
  90+ AC41

1183  AC41                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
