   1+ AC41              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ AC41 2A 99 9C                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ AC44 3A 98 9C                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ AC47 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ AC49 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ AC4C 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ AC4D                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ AC4D CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ AC4F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ AC51 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ AC53 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ AC55 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ AC56 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ AC57 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ AC58              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ AC58 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ AC5A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ AC5C CB 20                                sla b
  15+ AC5E 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ AC60 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ AC62 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ AC63 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ AC65 C9                                   ret
  20+ AC66
  21+ AC66
  22+ AC66              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ AC66 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ AC66 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ AC66 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ AC66 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ AC66 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ AC66 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ AC66 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ AC66 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ AC66 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ AC66 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ AC66 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ AC66 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ AC66 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ AC66 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ AC66 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ AC66 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ AC66                                      ENDM
  40+ AC66
  41+ AC66
  42+ AC66
  43+ AC66                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ AC66              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ AC66 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ AC67 3A 98 9C    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ AC6A 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AC6B AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ AC6C E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ AC6E 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ AC6F 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ AC70 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AC72 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ AC73 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ AC74 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AC76 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AC77 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ AC79 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ AC7A B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ AC7B 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ AC7C 2A 99 9C     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ AC7F CD 88 AC                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ AC82 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ AC83                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ AC83 B7          >                        or a
  49+ AC84 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ AC86 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ AC87 C9                                   ret
  52+ AC88
  53+ AC88
  54+ AC88 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ AC89 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ AC8B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ AC8C AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ AC8D                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ AC8D FA A5 AC    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ AC90 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ AC91 B2                                   or      d
  61+ AC92                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ AC92 FA 97 AC    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ AC95 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ AC96 C9                                   ret
  64+ AC97 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ AC98 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ AC9A 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ AC9B 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ AC9C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ AC9E 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ AC9F 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ ACA0 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ ACA2 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ ACA3 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ ACA4 C9                                   ret
  75+ ACA5 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ ACA6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ ACA8 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ ACA9 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ ACAA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ ACAC 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ ACAD B7                                   or      a
  82+ ACAE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ ACB0 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ ACB2 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ ACB3 B4                                   or      h
  86+ ACB4 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ ACB5 C9                                   ret
  88+ ACB6              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ ACB6 AF          >                    xor a
  88+ ACB7 95          >                    sub l
  88+ ACB8 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ ACB9 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ ACBA 94          >                    sub h
  88+ ACBB 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ ACBC 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ ACBD EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ ACBF B4                                   or      h
  92+ ACC0 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ ACC1 C9                                   ret
  94+ ACC2
  95+ ACC2
  96+ ACC2                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ ACC2                  ;
  98+ ACC2                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ ACC2                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ ACC2                  ;
 101+ ACC2                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ ACC2                  ;         carry reset
 103+ ACC2                  ;
 104+ ACC2                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ ACC2 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ ACC3 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ ACC4 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ ACC6 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ ACC7 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ ACC9
 111+ ACC9 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ ACCA 85                                   add a,l
 113+ ACCB 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ ACCC EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ ACCD
 116+ ACCD 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ ACCE CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ ACD0 C9                                   ret
 119+ ACD1
 120+ ACD1
 121+ ACD1
 122+ ACD1                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ ACD1                 ;
 124+ ACD1                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ ACD1                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ ACD1                 ;
 127+ ACD1                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ ACD1                 ;         carry reset
 129+ ACD1                 ;
 130+ ACD1                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ ACD1
 132+ ACD1
 133+ ACD1
 134+ ACD1 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ ACD2 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ ACD3 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ ACD4 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ ACD5 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ ACD6 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ ACD7              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ ACD7 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ ACD9 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ ACDA ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ ACDC
 145+ ACDC AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ ACDD 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ ACDE 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ ACDF
 149+ ACDF 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ ACE0 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ ACE1 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ ACE3
 153+ ACE3 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ ACE4 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ ACE5
 156+ ACE5 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ ACE6 85                                   add a,l
 158+ ACE7 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ ACE8 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ ACE9
 161+ ACE9 D1                                   pop de
 162+ ACEA ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ ACEC
 164+ ACEC EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ ACED ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ ACEF EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ ACF0
 168+ ACF0 C9                                   ret
 169+ ACF1
 170+ ACF1              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ ACF1              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ ACF1              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ ACF1              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ ACF1              ;         carry reset
 175+ ACF1              ; maths is
 176+ ACF1              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ ACF1              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ ACF1              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ ACF1              ;
 180+ ACF1              ;
 181+ ACF1              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ ACF1 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ ACF2 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ ACF3 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ ACF4 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ ACF5 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ ACF6 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ ACF7 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ ACF9 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ ACFA ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ ACFC 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ ACFD 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ ACFE 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ ACFF ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ AD01 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ AD02 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ AD03 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ AD04 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ AD05                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ AD05 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ AD06 C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ AD07 C9                                   ret
 203+ AD08
 204+ AD08
 205+ AD08              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 206+ AD08              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 207+ AD08 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 208+ AD09 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 209+ AD0A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 210+ AD0C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 211+ AD0E 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 212+ AD0F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ AD11 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 214+ AD12 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 215+ AD13 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 216+ AD15              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 217+ AD15 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 218+ AD16 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 219+ AD17 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 220+ AD19 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 221+ AD1A 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 222+ AD1B 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 223+ AD1C 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 224+ AD1D 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 225+ AD1E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 226+ AD1F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 227+ AD21 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 228+ AD22 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 229+ AD23 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 230+ AD24 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 231+ AD25 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 232+ AD26 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 233+ AD27 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 234+ AD28 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 235+ AD2A 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 236+ AD2B 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 237+ AD2C FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 238+ AD2E 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 239+ AD2F C9                                   ret
 240+ AD30
 241+ AD30              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 242+ AD30              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 243+ AD30              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 244+ AD30              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 245+ AD30              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 246+ AD30              ;mult3
 247+ AD30              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 248+ AD30              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 249+ AD30              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 250+ AD30              ; Algorithm
 251+ AD30              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 252+ AD30              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 253+ AD30              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 254+ AD30              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 255+ AD30              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 256+ AD30              ;
 257+ AD30              ;
 258+ AD30 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 259+ AD31 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 260+ AD32 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 261+ AD34 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 262+ AD36 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 263+ AD37 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 264+ AD39 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 265+ AD3A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 266+ AD3B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 267+ AD3D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 268+ AD3E B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 269+ AD3F 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 270+ AD41 7C                                   ld      a,h
 271+ AD42 B5                                   or      l
 272+ AD43 B3                                   or      e
 273+ AD44 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 274+ AD46              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 275+ AD46 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 276+ AD47 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 277+ AD49 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 278+ AD4A FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 279+ AD4C 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 280+ AD4D 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 281+ AD4E ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 282+ AD50 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 283+ AD52 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 284+ AD53 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 285+ AD54 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 286+ AD56 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 287+ AD57 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 288+ AD58 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 289+ AD5A FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 290+ AD5C 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 291+ AD5D 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 292+ AD5E 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 293+ AD5F CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 294+ AD61 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 295+ AD63 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 296+ AD64 C9                                   ret
 297+ AD65 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 298+ AD68                                      ZeroA
 298+ AD68 AF          >                        xor a
 299+ AD69 4F                                   ld      c,a
 300+ AD6A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 301+ AD6B C9                                   ret
 302+ AD6C
 303+ AD6C              ;;;
 304+ AD6C              ;;;
 305+ AD6C              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 306+ AD6C              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 307+ AD6C              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 308+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 309+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 310+ AD6C              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 311+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 312+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 313+ AD6C              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 314+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 315+ AD6C              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 316+ AD6C              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 317+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 318+ AD6C              ;;;                        or      l
 319+ AD6C              ;;;                        or      e
 320+ AD6C              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 321+ AD6C              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 322+ AD6C              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 323+ AD6C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 324+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 325+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 326+ AD6C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 327+ AD6C              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 328+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 329+ AD6C              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 330+ AD6C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 331+ AD6C              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 332+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 333+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 334+ AD6C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 335+ AD6C              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 336+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 337+ AD6C              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 338+ AD6C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 339+ AD6C              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 340+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 341+ AD6C              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 342+ AD6C              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 343+ AD6C              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 344+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 345+ AD6C              ;;;                        ret
 346+ AD6C              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 347+ AD6C              ;;;                        ZeroA
 348+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 349+ AD6C              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 350+ AD6C              ;;;                        ret
 351+ AD6C
 352+ AD6C              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 353+ AD6C              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 354+ AD6C              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 355+ AD6C              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 356+ AD6C              ;         carry reset
 357+ AD6C              ;
 358+ AD6C              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 359+ AD6C 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 360+ AD6D AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 361+ AD6E 32 6C AD                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 362+ AD71 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 363+ AD72 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 364+ AD75 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 365+ AD77 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 366+ AD79 57                                   ld      d,a
 367+ AD7A 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 368+ AD7C 32 6C AD                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 369+ AD7F 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 370+ AD80 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 371+ AD83 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 372+ AD85 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 373+ AD87 67                                   ld      h,a
 374+ AD88 3A 6C AD                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 375+ AD8B EE 80                                xor     $80
 376+ AD8D 32 6C AD                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 377+ AD90 CD F1 AC     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 378+ AD93 3A 6C AD     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 379+ AD96 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 380+ AD99 C8                                   ret     z
 381+ AD9A AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 382+ AD9B 95                                   sub 	l
 383+ AD9C 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 384+ AD9D 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 385+ AD9E 94                                   sub 	h
 386+ AD9F 67                                   ld 		h,a
 387+ ADA0 C9                                   ret
 388+ ADA1
 389+ ADA1 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 390+ ADA2 32 6C AD                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 391+ ADA5 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 392+ ADA6 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 393+ ADA9 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 394+ ADAB E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 395+ ADAD 57                                   ld      d,a
 396+ ADAE 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 397+ ADB0 32 6C AD                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 398+ ADB3 CD F1 AC     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 399+ ADB6 3A 6C AD     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 400+ ADB9 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 401+ ADBC C8                                   ret     z
 402+ ADBD AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 403+ ADBE 95                                   sub 	l
 404+ ADBF 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 405+ ADC0 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 406+ ADC1 94                                   sub 	h
 407+ ADC2 67                                   ld 		h,a
 408+ ADC3 C9                                   ret
 409+ ADC4
 410+ ADC4
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1184  ADC4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ ADC4              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ ADC4              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ ADC4
   4+ ADC4              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ ADC4 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ ADC4 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ ADC4 ~            			mul
   8+ ADC4              			ENDM
   9+ ADC4
  10+ ADC4              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ ADC4 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ ADC4 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ ADC4 ~            			mul
  14+ ADC4 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ ADC4              			ENDM
  16+ ADC4
  17+ ADC4
  18+ ADC4              asm_squa:
  19+ ADC4 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ ADC6              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ ADC6              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ ADC6              asm_squa2:
  23+ ADC6 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ ADC7 57           	ld d,a
  25+ ADC8 ED 30        	mul
  26+ ADCA ED 53 95 9B  	ld (varP),de
  27+ ADCE 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ ADCF C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1185  ADD0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ ADD0              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ ADD0              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ ADD0              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ ADD0              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ ADD0              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ ADD0              asm_sqrt:
   7+ ADD0 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ ADD3 61           	ld h,c
   9+ ADD4 69           	ld l,c
  10+ ADD5              .sqrloop:
  11+ ADD5 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ ADD7 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ ADD9 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ ADDA EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ ADDB ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ ADDD 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ ADDF EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ ADE0 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ ADE1 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ ADE3              .sqrbit:
  21+ ADE3 19           	add hl,de
  22+ ADE4 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ ADE5 B7           	or a
  24+ ADE6 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ ADE8              .sqrfi:
  26+ ADE8 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ ADEA CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ ADEC CB 38        	srl b
  29+ ADEE CB 19        	rr c
  30+ ADF0 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ ADF2 C9           	ret
  32+ ADF3
  33+ ADF3
  34+ ADF3              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ ADF3 3A 98 9C     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ ADF6 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ ADF7 3A 99 9C     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ ADFA 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ ADFB CD D0 AD     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ ADFE 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ ADFF 32 98 9C     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ AE02 C9           	ret
  43+ AE03
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1186  AE03                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ AE03              ;
   2+ AE03              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ AE03              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ AE03              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ AE03              ;               if a >= D
   6+ AE03              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ AE03              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ AE03              ;           else
   9+ AE03
  10+ AE03              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ AE03              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ AE03              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ AE03              ;
  14+ AE03              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  15+ AE03              ;
  16+ AE03              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  17+ AE03              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  18+ AE03 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
  19+ AE04 15                                   dec     d
  20+ AE05 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
  21+ AE07 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
  22+ AE09 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
  23+ AE0B 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
  24+ AE0C B3                                   or      e
  25+ AE0D 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
  26+ AE0F 14                                   inc     d
  27+ AE10 15                                   dec     d
  28+ AE11 CD 85 AF                             call    BC_Div_DE
  29+ AE14                                      ZeroA
  29+ AE14 AF          >                        xor a
  30+ AE15 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
  31+ AE16 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
  32+ AE18 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
  33+ AE19 C9                                   ret
  34+ AE1A AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
  35+ AE1B 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
  36+ AE1C 67                                   ld      h,a
  37+ AE1D 6F                                   ld      l,a
  38+ AE1E C9                                   ret
  39+ AE1F 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
  40+ AE21 67                                   ld      h,a
  41+ AE22 6F                                   ld      l,a
  42+ AE23                                      SetCarryFlag
  42+ AE23 37          >                        scf
  43+ AE24 C9                                   ret
  44+ AE25
  45+ AE25              AEquAmul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
  45+ AE25 BA          >                        cp     d
  45+ AE26 D2 44 AE    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
  46+ AE29 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  47+ AE2B CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  48+ AE2D 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  49+ AE2F                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  49+ AE2F BA          >                        cp      d
  49+ AE30 DA 35 AE    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  50+ AE33 92                                   sub     d
  51+ AE34                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  51+ AE34 B7          >                        or a
  52+ AE35              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  52+ AE35 3F          >                        ccf
  53+ AE36 CB 13                                rl      e
  54+ AE38 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  55+ AE3A 7B                                   ld      a,e
  56+ AE3B C9                                   ret
  57+ AE3C 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  58+ AE3D                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  58+ AE3D 37          >                        scf
  59+ AE3E CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  60+ AE40 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  61+ AE42 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  62+ AE43 C9                                   ret
  63+ AE44 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  64+ AE46 C9                                   ret
  65+ AE47
  66+ AE47
  67+ AE47              ; Divide 8-bit values
  68+ AE47              ; In: Divide E by divider C
  69+ AE47              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
  70+ AE47              ;
  71+ AE47              ;;;Div8:
  72+ AE47              ;;;    xor a
  73+ AE47              ;;;    ld b,8
  74+ AE47              ;;;Div8_Loop:
  75+ AE47              ;;;    rl e
  76+ AE47              ;;;    rla
  77+ AE47              ;;;    sub c
  78+ AE47              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  79+ AE47              ;;;    add a,c
  80+ AE47              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  81+ AE47              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  82+ AE47              ;;;    ld b,a0
  83+ AE47              ;;;    ld a,e
  84+ AE47              ;;;    rla
  85+ AE47              ;;;    cpl
  86+ AE47              ;;;    ret
  87+ AE47
  88+ AE47              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  89+ AE47              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  90+ AE47              ;;         A is a copy of E
  91+ AE47              ;;         HL is the remainder
  92+ AE47              ;;         BC is not changed
  93+ AE47              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  94+ AE47              ;140 bytes
  95+ AE47              ;145cc
  96+ AE47
  97+ AE47              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  98+ AE47 ~                                rla
  99+ AE47 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 100+ AE47 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 101+ AE47 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 102+ AE47 ~                                add     hl,bc
 103+ AE47                                  ENDM
 104+ AE47
 105+ AE47              DEequDEDivBC:
 106+ AE47 AF               xor a
 107+ AE48 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
 108+ AE4A 7A               ld a,d
 109+ AE4B                  MacroDEDivBC
 109+ AE4B 17          >                    rla
 109+ AE4C ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 109+ AE4E ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 109+ AE50 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 109+ AE52 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 110+ AE53                  MacroDEDivBC
 110+ AE53 17          >                    rla
 110+ AE54 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 110+ AE56 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

 130+ AECF 17               rla
 131+ AED0 2F               cpl

 134+ AED3
 135+ AED3
 136+ AED3
 137+ AED3              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 138+ AED3              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 139+ AED3              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 140+ AED3              ; Our use
 141+ AED3              ; BC = A0
 142+ AED3              ; DE = 0C
 143+ AED3              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 144+ AED3              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 144+ AED3 B9          >                        cp     c
 144+ AED4 D2 FF AE    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 145+ AED7 47                                   ld      b,a
 146+ AED8 59                                   ld      e,c
 147+ AED9 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 148+ AEDB 16 00                                ld      d,0
 149+ AEDD C3 EA AE                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 150+ AEE0 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 151+ AEE1 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 152+ AEE3 21 98 9C                             ld      hl,varQ
 153+ AEE6 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 154+ AEE7 16 00                                ld      d,0
 155+ AEE9 5F                                   ld      e,a
 156+ AEEA              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 157+ AEEA 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 158+ AEED 78                                   ld      a,b
 159+ AEEE 06 10                                ld      b,16
 160+ AEF0 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 161+ AEF2 17                                   rla			; ...
 162+ AEF3 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 163+ AEF5 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 164+ AEF7 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 165+ AEF9 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 166+ AEFA 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 167+ AEFB 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 168+ AEFD 47                                   ld   b,a
 169+ AEFE C9                                   ret
 170+ AEFF 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 171+ AF02 C9                                   ret
 172+ AF03
 173+ AF03              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 174+ AF03 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 175+ AF05 AF                                   xor a
 176+ AF06 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 177+ AF08 17                                   rla
 178+ AF09 BA                                   cp d
 179+ AF0A 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 179+ AF0C
 180+ AF0C 0C                                   inc c
 181+ AF0D 92                                   sub d
 182+ AF0E 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 183+ AF10 C9                                   ret
 184+ AF11              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 185+ AF11 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 186+ AF13 AF                                   xor a
 187+ AF14 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 188+ AF16 CB 14                                rl	h
 189+ AF18              ;    add hl,hl
 190+ AF18 17                                   rla
 191+ AF19 B9                                   cp c
 192+ AF1A 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 193+ AF1C 2C                                   inc l
 194+ AF1D 91                                   sub c
 195+ AF1E 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 196+ AF20 C9                                   ret
 197+ AF21              ;
 198+ AF21              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 199+ AF21              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 200+ AF21              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 201+ AF21              ;
 202+ AF21              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 203+ AF21 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 204+ AF21 ~            					rla				; ...
 205+ AF21 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 206+ AF21 ~            					jr	1F
 207+ AF21 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 208+ AF21 ~            1:
 209+ AF21 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 210+ AF21              					ENDM
 211+ AF21
 212+ AF21
 213+ AF21
 214+ AF21              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 215+ AF21 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 216+ AF24 78                               ld a,b
 217+ AF25 06 08                            ld b,8
 218+ AF27 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 219+ AF28 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 220+ AF2A ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 221+ AF2C 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 222+ AF2E 19                               add hl,de
 223+ AF2F 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 224+ AF31 17                               rla
 225+ AF32 2F                               cpl
 226+ AF33 47                               ld b,a
 227+ AF34 79                               ld a,c
 228+ AF35 48                               ld c,b
 229+ AF36 06 08                            ld b,8
 230+ AF38 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 231+ AF39 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 232+ AF3B ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 233+ AF3D 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 234+ AF3F 19                               add hl,de
 235+ AF40 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 236+ AF42 17                               rla
 237+ AF43 2F                               cpl
 238+ AF44 41                               ld b,c
 239+ AF45 4F                               ld c,a
 240+ AF46 C9                               ret
 241+ AF47
 242+ AF47
 243+ AF47              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 244+ AF47 ~                                    rl  e
 245+ AF47 ~                                    rla
 246+ AF47 ~                                    sub c
 247+ AF47 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 248+ AF47 ~                                    add a,c
 249+ AF47 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 250+ AF47                                      ENDM
 251+ AF47
 252+ AF47              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 253+ AF47              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 253+ AF47 AF          >                        xor a
 254+ AF48                                      EDivC_Iteration
 254+ AF48 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 254+ AF4A 17          >                        rla
 254+ AF4B 91          >                        sub c
 254+ AF4C 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 254+ AF4E 81          >                        add a,c
 254+ AF4F             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 255+ AF4F                                      EDivC_Iteration
 255+ AF4F CB 13       >                        rl  e
 255+ AF51 17          >                        rla
 255+ AF52 91          >                        sub c
 255+ AF53 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 255+ AF55 81          >                        add a,c
 255+ AF56             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 256+ AF56                                      EDivC_Iteration
 256+ AF56 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 256+ AF58 17          >                        rla
 256+ AF59 91          >                        sub c
 256+ AF5A 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 256+ AF5C 81          >                        add a,c
 256+ AF5D             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 257+ AF5D                                      EDivC_Iteration
 257+ AF5D CB 13       >                        rl  e
 257+ AF5F 17          >                        rla
 257+ AF60 91          >                        sub c
 257+ AF61 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 257+ AF63 81          >                        add a,c
 257+ AF64             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 258+ AF64                                      EDivC_Iteration
 258+ AF64 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 258+ AF66 17          >                        rla
 258+ AF67 91          >                        sub c
 258+ AF68 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 258+ AF6A 81          >                        add a,c
 258+ AF6B             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 259+ AF6B                                      EDivC_Iteration
 259+ AF6B CB 13       >                        rl  e
 259+ AF6D 17          >                        rla
 259+ AF6E 91          >                        sub c
 259+ AF6F 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 259+ AF71 81          >                        add a,c
 259+ AF72             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 260+ AF72                                      EDivC_Iteration
 260+ AF72 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 260+ AF74 17          >                        rla
 260+ AF75 91          >                        sub c
 260+ AF76 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 260+ AF78 81          >                        add a,c
 260+ AF79             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 261+ AF79                                      EDivC_Iteration
 261+ AF79 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 261+ AF7B 17          >                        rla
 261+ AF7C 91          >                        sub c
 261+ AF7D 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 261+ AF7F 81          >                        add a,c
 261+ AF80             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 262+ AF80 47                                   ld      b,a
 263+ AF81 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ AF82 17                                   rla
 265+ AF83 2F                                   cpl
 266+ AF84 C9                                   ret
 267+ AF85
 268+ AF85
 269+ AF85              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 270+ AF85 ~                                    rla
 271+ AF85 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 272+ AF85 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 273+ AF85 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 274+ AF85 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 275+ AF85 ~            1:
 276+ AF85                                      ENDM
 277+ AF85
 278+ AF85
 279+ AF85              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 280+ AF85              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 281+ AF85              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 282+ AF85              ;min: 738cc
 283+ AF85              ;max: 898cc
 284+ AF85              ;avg: 818cc
 285+ AF85              ;144 bytes
 286+ AF85 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 287+ AF86 67                                   ld h,a
 288+ AF87 6F                                   ld l,a
 289+ AF88 93                                   sub e
 290+ AF89 5F                                   ld e,a
 291+ AF8A 9F                                   sbc a,a
 292+ AF8B 92                                   sub d
 293+ AF8C 57                                   ld d,a
 294+ AF8D 78                                   ld a,b
 295+ AF8E                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 295+ AF8E 17          >                        rla
 295+ AF8F ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 295+ AF91 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 295+ AF92 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 295+ AF94 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 295+ AF96             >1:
 296+ AF96                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 296+ AF96 17          >                        rla
 296+ AF97 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 296+ AF99 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 296+ AF9A 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 296+ AF9C ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 296+ AF9E             >1:
 297+ AF9E                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 297+ AF9E 17          >                        rla
 297+ AF9F ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 297+ AFA1 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 297+ AFA2 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 297+ AFA4 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 297+ AFA6             >1:
 298+ AFA6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 298+ AFA6 17          >                        rla
 298+ AFA7 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 298+ AFA9 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 298+ AFAA 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 298+ AFAC ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 298+ AFAE             >1:
 299+ AFAE                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 299+ AFAE 17          >                        rla
 299+ AFAF ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 299+ AFB1 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 299+ AFB2 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 299+ AFB4 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 299+ AFB6             >1:
 300+ AFB6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 300+ AFB6 17          >                        rla
 300+ AFB7 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 300+ AFB9 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 300+ AFBA 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 300+ AFBC ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 300+ AFBE             >1:
 301+ AFBE                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 301+ AFBE 17          >                        rla
 301+ AFBF ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 301+ AFC1 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 301+ AFC2 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 301+ AFC4 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 301+ AFC6             >1:
 302+ AFC6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 302+ AFC6 17          >                        rla
 302+ AFC7 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 302+ AFC9 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 302+ AFCA 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 302+ AFCC ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 302+ AFCE             >1:
 303+ AFCE 17                                   rla
 304+ AFCF 47                                   ld b,a
 305+ AFD0
 306+ AFD0 79                                   ld a,c
 307+ AFD1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 307+ AFD1 17          >                        rla
 307+ AFD2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 307+ AFD4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 307+ AFD5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 307+ AFD7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 307+ AFD9             >1:
 308+ AFD9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 308+ AFD9 17          >                        rla
 308+ AFDA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 308+ AFDC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 308+ AFDD 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 308+ AFDF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 308+ AFE1             >1:
 309+ AFE1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 309+ AFE1 17          >                        rla
 309+ AFE2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 309+ AFE4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 309+ AFE5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 309+ AFE7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 309+ AFE9             >1:
 310+ AFE9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 310+ AFE9 17          >                        rla
 310+ AFEA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 310+ AFEC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 310+ AFED 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 310+ AFEF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 310+ AFF1             >1:
 311+ AFF1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 311+ AFF1 17          >                        rla
 311+ AFF2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 311+ AFF4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 311+ AFF5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 311+ AFF7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 311+ AFF9             >1:
 312+ AFF9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 312+ AFF9 17          >                        rla
 312+ AFFA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 312+ AFFC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 312+ AFFD 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 312+ AFFF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 312+ B001             >1:
 313+ B001                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 313+ B001 17          >                        rla
 313+ B002 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 313+ B004 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 313+ B005 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 313+ B007 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 313+ B009             >1:
 314+ B009                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 314+ B009 17          >                        rla
 314+ B00A ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 314+ B00C 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 314+ B00D 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 314+ B00F ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 314+ B011             >1:
 315+ B011 17                                   rla
 316+ B012 4F                                   ld c,a
 317+ B013 C9                                   ret
 318+ B014
 319+ B014              ;Inputs:
 320+ B014              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 321+ B014              ;Outputs:
 322+ B014              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 323+ B014              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 324+ B014              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 325+ B014              ;Otherwise:
 326+ B014              ;min: 1107cc
 327+ B014              ;max: 1319cc
 328+ B014              ;avg: 1201cc
 329+ B014 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 330+ B015 AA                                   xor d
 331+ B016 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 332+ B017              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 333+ B017 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 334+ B018 F2 21 B0                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 335+ B01B AF                                   xor a
 336+ B01C 91                                   sub c
 337+ B01D 4F                                   ld c,a
 338+ B01E 9F                                   sbc a,a
 339+ B01F 90                                   sub b
 340+ B020 47                                   ld b,a
 341+ B021 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 342+ B022 B2                                   or d
 343+ B023 FA 2C B0                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 344+ B026 AF                                   xor a
 345+ B027 93                                   sub e
 346+ B028 5F                                   ld e,a
 347+ B029 9F                                   sbc a,a
 348+ B02A 92                                   sub d
 349+ B02B 57                                   ld d,a
 350+ B02C B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 351+ B02D 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 352+ B02F 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 353+ B031 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 354+ B032 83                                   add a,e
 355+ B033 7A                                   ld a,d
 356+ B034 8C                                   adc a,h
 357+ B035 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 358+ B037 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 359+ B038 79                                   ld a,c
 360+ B039 CD 54 B0                             call div_fixed88_sub
 361+ B03C 4F                                   ld c,a
 362+ B03D 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 363+ B03E CD 54 B0                             call div_fixed88_sub
 364+ B041 51                                   ld d,c
 365+ B042 5F                                   ld e,a
 366+ B043 F1                                   pop af
 367+ B044 F0                                   ret p
 368+ B045 AF                                   xor a
 369+ B046 93                                   sub e
 370+ B047 5F                                   ld e,a
 371+ B048 9F                                   sbc a,a
 372+ B049 92                                   sub d
 373+ B04A 57                                   ld d,a
 374+ B04B C9                                   ret
 375+ B04C
 376+ B04C 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 377+ B04F F1                                   pop af
 378+ B050 F0                                   ret p
 379+ B051 13                                   inc de
 380+ B052 1C                                   inc e
 381+ B053 C9                                   ret
 382+ B054
 383+ B054              ;min: 456cc
 384+ B054              ;max: 536cc
 385+ B054              ;avg: 496cc
 386+ B054 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 387+ B056 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 388+ B057 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 389+ B059 19                                   add hl,de
 390+ B05A 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 391+ B05C ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 392+ B05E 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 393+ B060 8F                                   adc a,a
 394+ B061 C9                                   ret
 395+ B062
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1187  B062                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ B062              asm_tis2:
   2+ B062              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ B062              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ B062 F5           	push af
   5+ B063 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ B065 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ B066 3A 98 9C     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ B069 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ B06A 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ B06B BB           	cp e
  11+ B06C 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ B06E 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ B070 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ B072 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ B073 3A 98 9C     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ B076 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ B077 CD 11 AF     	call asm_div16
  18+ B07A F1           	pop af
  19+ B07B E6 80        	and $80
  20+ B07D B5           	or l
  21+ B07E C9           	ret
  22+ B07F              .tis2_set96:
  23+ B07F F1           	pop af
  24+ B080 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ B082 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ B084 C9           	ret
  27+ B085
  28+ B085
  29+ B085              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ B085              squareregfx:
  31+ B085 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ B088 57           	ld d,a
  33+ B089 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ B08A ED 30        	mul
  35+ B08C EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ B08D              squareregfy:
  37+ B08D 3A 85 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ B090 57           	ld d,a
  39+ B091 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ B092 ED 30        	mul
  41+ B094 19           	add hl,de
  42+ B095              squareregfz:
  43+ B095 3A 87 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ B098 57           	ld d,a
  45+ B099 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ B09A ED 30        	mul
  47+ B09C 19           	add hl,de
  48+ B09D EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ B09E              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ B09E CD D0 AD     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ B0A1 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ B0A2 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ B0A3 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ B0A4              normfx:
  55+ B0A4 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ B0A7 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ B0A8 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ B0A9 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ B0AA CD 62 B0     	call asm_tis2
  60+ B0AD 32 83 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ B0B0              normfy:
  62+ B0B0 3A 85 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ B0B3 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ B0B4 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ B0B5 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ B0B6 CD 62 B0     	call asm_tis2
  67+ B0B9 32 85 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ B0BC              normfz:
  69+ B0BC 3A 87 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ B0BF E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ B0C0 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ B0C1 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ B0C2 CD 62 B0     	call asm_tis2
  74+ B0C5 32 87 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ B0C8              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ B0C8 C9           	ret
  77+ B0C9
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1188  B0C9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ B0C9              ; Input:
   2+ B0C9              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ B0C9              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ B0C9              ; Output:
   5+ B0C9              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ B0C9              ;
   7+ B0C9              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ B0C9              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ B0C9              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ B0C9              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ B0C9              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ B0C9              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ B0C9              ;
  14+ B0C9
  15+ B0C9 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ B0CA A7                               and     a
  17+ B0CB ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ B0CD E1                               pop     hl
  19+ B0CE C9                               ret
  20+ B0CF
  21+ B0CF              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ B0CF              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ B0CF
  24+ B0CF E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ B0D1 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ B0D2 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ B0D4 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ B0D5 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ B0D6 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ B0D8 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ B0D9 A7                               and     a
  32+ B0DA ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ B0DC D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ B0DE C9                               ret
  35+ B0DF
  36+ B0DF
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1189  B0DF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ B0DF              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ B0DF              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ B0DF              negate16:
   4+ B0DF              negate16hl:
   5+ B0DF                      ; Input:
   6+ B0DF                      ;       HL = value
   7+ B0DF                      ; Output:
   8+ B0DF                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ B0DF                      ; Destroys:
  10+ B0DF                      ;       AF
  11+ B0DF                      ;
  12+ B0DF AF           	xor 	a
  13+ B0E0 95           	sub 	l
  14+ B0E1 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ B0E2 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ B0E3 94           	sub 	h
  17+ B0E4 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ B0E5 C9           	ret
  19+ B0E6
  20+ B0E6              negate16de:
  21+ B0E6 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ B0E7 93           	sub 	e
  23+ B0E8 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ B0E9 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ B0EA 92           	sub 	d
  26+ B0EB 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ B0EC C9           	ret
  28+ B0ED
  29+ B0ED              negate16bc:
  30+ B0ED AF           	xor 	a
  31+ B0EE 91           	sub 	c
  32+ B0EF 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ B0F0 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ B0F1 90           	sub 	b
  35+ B0F2 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ B0F3 C9           	ret
  37+ B0F4
  38+ B0F4
  39+ B0F4              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ B0F4 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ B0F4 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ B0F4 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ B0F4 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ B0F4 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ B0F4 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ B0F4              					ENDM
  47+ B0F4
  48+ B0F4              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ B0F4 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ B0F4 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ B0F4 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ B0F4 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ B0F4 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ B0F4 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ B0F4              					ENDM
  56+ B0F4              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ B0F4 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ B0F4 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ B0F4 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ B0F4 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ B0F4 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ B0F4 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ B0F4              					ENDM
  64+ B0F4
  65+ B0F4              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ B0F4 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ B0F4 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ B0F4 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ B0F4 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ B0F4 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ B0F4 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ B0F4              					ENDM
