1190  B0F4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ B0F4 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ B0F6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ B0F6 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B0F7 D2 0C B1    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ B0FA 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ B0FB CD 03 AF                             call		asm_div8
   5+ B0FE 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ B0FF CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ B101 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ B102 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ B104 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ B105 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ B106 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ B108 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ B10A B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ B10B C9                                   ret
  15+ B10C              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ B10C              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ B10C DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ B10E E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ B110 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ B112 C9                                   ret
  21+ B113
  22+ B113
  23+ B113
  24+ B113
  25+ B113              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ B113                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ B113 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ B116 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ B118 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ B11A              N96SQX:
  31+ B11A              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ B11A 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ B11B 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ B11C ED 30       >			mul
  32+ B11E 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ B11F 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ B120              N96SQY:
  35+ B120 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ B123 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ B125 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ B127              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ B127 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ B128 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ B129 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ B12B 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ B12C              N96SQZ:
  41+ B12C 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ B12F FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ B131 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ B133              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ B133 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ B134 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ B135 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ B137              N96SQADD:
  46+ B137 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ B138 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ B139              N96SQRT:
  49+ B139 CD D0 AD     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ B13C              N96NORMX:
  51+ B13C 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ B13F E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ B141 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ B142 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ B143 CD 6A B3     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ B146 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ B147 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ B149 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ B14B B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ B14C 32 83 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ B14F              N96NORMY:
  62+ B14F 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ B152 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ B154 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ B155 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ B156 CD 6A B3     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ B159 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ B15A DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ B15C E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ B15E B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ B15F 32 84 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ B162              N96NORMZ:
  73+ B162 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ B165 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ B167 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ B168 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ B169 CD 6A B3     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ B16C 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ B16D FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ B16F E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ B171 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ B172 32 85 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ B175 C9           	ret
  84+ B176
  85+ B176              ; Normalise vector
  86+ B176              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ B176              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ B176              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ B176              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ B176              ;
  91+ B176              ;
  92+ B176              ;
  93+ B176
  94+ B176              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ B176 3A 83 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ B179                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ B179 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ B17A 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ B17B ED 30       >			mul
  97+ B17D 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ B17E 32 99 9C                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ B181 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ B182 32 98 9C                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ B185 32 95 9B                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ B188 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ B18B                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ B18B 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ B18C 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ B18D ED 30       >			mul
 104+ B18F 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ B190 32 B4 9C                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ B193 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ B194 32 95 9B                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ B197 21 98 9C                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ B19A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ B19B 32 98 9C                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ B19E 3A B4 9C                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ B1A1 21 99 9C                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ B1A4 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ B1A5 32 99 9C                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ B1A8 3A 85 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ B1AB                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ B1AB 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ B1AC 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ B1AD ED 30       >			mul
 117+ B1AF 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ B1B0 32 B4 9C                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ B1B3 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ B1B4 32 95 9B                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ B1B7 21 98 9C                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ B1BA 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ B1BB 32 98 9C                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ B1BE 3A B4 9C                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ B1C1 21 99 9C                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ B1C4 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ B1C5 32 99 9C                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ B1C8 CD F3 AD                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ B1CB 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ B1CE CD 64 B3                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ B1D1 32 83 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ B1D4 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ B1D7 CD 64 B3                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ B1DA 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ B1DD 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ B1E0 CD 64 B3                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ B1E3 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ B1E6 C9                                   ret
 139+ B1E7
 140+ B1E7
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1191  B1E7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ B1E7              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ B1E7              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ B1E7              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ B1E7              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ B1E7              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ B1E7              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ B1E7              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ B1E7 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ B1EA CD 00 B2     	call	Num1
  10+ B1ED 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ B1F0 CD 00 B2     	call	Num1
  12+ B1F3 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ B1F6 CD 00 B2     	call	Num1
  14+ B1F9 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ B1FB CD 00 B2     	call	Num1
  16+ B1FE 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ B200              Num1:
  18+ B200 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ B202              .Num2:
  20+ B202 3C           	inc	a
  21+ B203 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ B204 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ B206 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ B208 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ B209 13           	inc	de
  26+ B20A C9           	ret
  27+ B20B
  28+ B20B              DispAtoDE:
  29+ B20B 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ B20D 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ B20E C3 E7 B1     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ B211
  33+ B211              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ B211 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ B213 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ B214 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ B217 CD 27 B2     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ B21A 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ B21C CD 00 B2     	call	Num1
  40+ B21F 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ B221 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ B222 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ B223 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ B225 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ B227              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ B227 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ B229              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ B229 3C           	inc	a
  49+ B22A 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ B22B 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ B22D FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ B22F 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ B231              .Blank:
  54+ B231 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ B233              .DontBlank:
  56+ B233 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ B235 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ B236 13           	inc	de
  59+ B237 C9           	ret
  60+ B238
  61+ B238              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ B238 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ B23A 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ B23C 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ B23E 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ B23F 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ B242 CD 4E B2     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ B245 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ B247 CD 4E B2     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ B24A 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ B24C 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ B24E              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ B24E 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ B250              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ B250 3C           	inc	a
  76+ B251 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ B252 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ B254 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ B256 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ B258              .Blank:
  81+ B258 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ B25A              .DontBlank:
  83+ B25A ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ B25C 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ B25D 13           	inc	de
  86+ B25E C9           	ret
  87+ B25F              .NoStock:
  88+ B25F 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ B261 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ B262 13           	inc	de
  91+ B263 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ B264 13           	inc	de
  93+ B265 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ B267 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ B268 13           	inc de
  96+ B269 C9           	ret
  97+ B26A
  98+ B26A
  99+ B26A              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ B26A              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ B26A              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ B26A              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ B26A 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ B26E 0A 00 00 00
 103+ B272 64 00 00 00
 103+ B276 E8 03 00 00
 103+ B27A 10 27 00 00
 104+ B27E A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ B282 40 42 0F 00
 104+ B286 80 96 98 00
 104+ B28A 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ B28E 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ B292 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ B296
 107+ B296              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ B296 CD A5 B2     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ B299 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ B29C FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ B29F 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ B2A1 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ B2A4 C9                                   ret
 114+ B2A5
 115+ B2A5 DD 22 92 B2  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ B2A9 ED 53 94 B2                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ B2AD DD 21 8E B2                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ B2B1 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ B2B3 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ B2B5 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ B2B7 B7                                   or a
 122+ B2B8 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ B2BB DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ B2BE 2A 92 B2                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ B2C1 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ B2C3 22 92 B2                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ B2C6 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ B2C9 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ B2CC 2A 94 B2                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ B2CF ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ B2D1 22 94 B2                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ B2D4 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ B2D6 0C                                   inc c
 134+ B2D7 3C                                   inc a
 135+ B2D8 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ B2DA DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ B2DD DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ B2E0 2A 92 B2                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ B2E3 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ B2E4 22 92 B2                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ B2E7 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ B2EA DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ B2ED 2A 94 B2                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ B2F0 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ B2F2 22 94 B2                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ B2F5 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ B2F8 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ B2FA 0C                                   inc c
 149+ B2FB 0D                                   dec c
 150+ B2FC 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ B2FE FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ B301 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ B303 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ B305 3A 92 B2                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ B308 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ B30A FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ B30D FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ B311 C9                                   ret
 159+ B312
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1192  B312                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ B312              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ B312              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ B312              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ B312 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ B313 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ B315 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ B316                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ B316 FA 24 B3    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ B319 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ B31A B1                                   or      c
  10+ B31B                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ B31B FA 20 B3    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ B31E 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ B31F C9                                   ret
  13+ B320 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ B321 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ B322 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ B323 C9                                   ret
  17+ B324 B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ B325 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ B327 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ B329 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ B32A C9                                   ret
  22+ B32B              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ B32B AF          >                    xor a
  22+ B32C 95          >                    sub l
  22+ B32D 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ B32E 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ B32F 94          >                    sub h
  22+ B330 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ B331 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ B332 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ B334 C9                                   ret
  26+ B335
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
1193  B335              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
1194  B335              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1195  B335                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ B335              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ B335 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ B336 D2 51 B3    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ B339 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ B33B CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ B33D                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ B33D BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ B33E DA 54 B3    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ B341 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ B342 37                                   scf
   7+ B343 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ B345 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ B347 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ B348 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ B34A CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ B34C 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ B34D CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ B34F 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ B350 C9                                   ret
  16+ B351 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ B353 C9                                   ret
  18+ B354 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ B355 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ B357 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ B359 C3 47 B3                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ B35C
  23+ B35C
  24+ B35C              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ B35C              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ B35C              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ B35C CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ B35E 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ B360 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ B362 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ B364              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ B364              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ B364              TIS2:
  34+ B364 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ B365 3A 98 9C     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ B368 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ B369 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ B36A              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ B36A 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ B36B E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ B36D              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ B36D BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ B36E D2 8E B3    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ B371 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ B373              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ B373 CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ B375              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ B375 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ B376 DA 94 B3    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ B379 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ B37A 37           	scf
  48+ B37B CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ B37D 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ B37F              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ B37F 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ B380 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ B382 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ B384 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ B385 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ B387 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ B388 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ B389 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ B38A E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ B38C B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ B38D C9           	ret
  62+ B38E              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ B38E              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ B38E 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ B38F E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ B391 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ B393 C9           	ret
  68+ B394              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ B394 B7           	or			a
  70+ B395 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ B397 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ B399 C3 7F B3     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ B39C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1196  B39C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ B39C              fmltu:
   2+ B39C              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ B39C              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ B39C 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ B39D 3A 98 9C     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ B3A0 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B3A1 ED 30        	mul
   8+ B3A3 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ B3A4 C9           	ret
  10+ B3A5
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1197  B3A5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ B3A5              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ B3A5              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ B3A5 21 78 9F     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ B3A8 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ B3AA ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ B3AC 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ B3AD C3 B9 B3     		jp		DV41
   8+ B3B0              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ B3B0 21 78 9F     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ B3B3 3A 83 9B     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ B3B6 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ B3B8 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ B3B9              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ B3B9 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ B3BA 3A 94 9C     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ B3BD              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ B3BD 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ B3BF CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ B3C1 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ B3C2 AF           		xor		a
  21+ B3C3              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ B3C3 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ B3C5 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ B3C7 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ B3C8 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ B3CA              DV8:
  27+ B3CA 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ B3CB 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ B3CC              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ B3CC CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ B3CE 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ B3D0              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ B3D0              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ B3D0 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ B3D2 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ B3D3              .RollRemainder:
  37+ B3D3 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ B3D5 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ B3D7 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ B3D8 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ B3DA              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ B3DA 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ B3DB              .DontSBC:
  44+ B3DB CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ B3DD 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ B3DF 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ B3E0 32 99 9C     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ B3E3 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ B3E4 32 95 9B     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ B3E7 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ B3E8              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ B3E8 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ B3E9 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ B3EA CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ B3EC 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ B3EE 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ B3EF 32 99 9C     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ B3F2 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ B3F3 32 95 9B     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ B3F6 C9           		ret
  61+ B3F7              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ B3F7 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ B3F9 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ B3FA 32 99 9C     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ B3FD 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ B3FE 32 95 9B     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ B401 C9           		ret
  68+ B402
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1198  B402                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"

   1+ B402
   2+ B402              asm_defmutl:

   4+ B402              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ B402 ED 30        	mul

1199  B406              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1200  B406              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1201  B406              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1202  B406                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ B406              APequQmulA:
   2+ B406              asm_mult1:
   3+ B406              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ B406 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ B408 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ B40A 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B40B 3A 98 9C     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ B40E 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ B40F FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ B411 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ B413 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ B414 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ B416 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ B417 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ B418 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ B41A 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ B41B 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ B41C E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ B41E 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ B41F ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ B421 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ B422 32 95 9B     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ B425 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ B426 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ B427 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ B428 C9           	ret
  27+ B429              .mul0:
  28+ B429 AF           	xor	a
  29+ B42A 32 95 9B     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ B42D 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ B42E 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ B42F C9           	ret
  33+ B430
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1203  B430                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ B430              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ B430              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ B430              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ B430              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ B430              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ B430              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ B430              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ B430              LL38:
   9+ B430              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ B430              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ B430              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ B430              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ B430              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ B430              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ B430              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ B430              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ B430              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ B430              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ B430              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ B430              ;	ret
  21+ B430              ; calculation table
  22+ B430              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ B430              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ B430              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ B430              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ B430              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ B430              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ B430              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ B430              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ B430              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ B430
  32+ B430              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ B430              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ B430              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ B430              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ B430
  37+ B430
  38+ B430              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ B430 21 9A 9C     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ B433 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ B434 FA 3F B4     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ B437 3A 98 9C     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ B43A 21 99 9C     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ B43D 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ B43E C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ B43F              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ B43F 3A 99 9C     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ B442 21 98 9C     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ B445              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ B445              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ B445 B7          >                        or a
  51+ B446 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ B447 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ B449              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ B449              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ B449              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ B449 C9           	ret
  57+ B44A              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ B44A FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ B44C 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ B44E ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ B450 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ B451 3A 9A 9C     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ B454 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ B456 32 9A 9C     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ B459 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ B45A                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ B45A B7          >                        or a
  67+ B45B C9           	ret
  68+ B45C              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ B45C 32 9A 9C         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ B45F                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ B45F B7          >                        or a
  71+ B460 C9               ret
  72+ B461              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ B461              ;--	push	bc
  74+ B461              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ B461              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ B461              ;--	sub		b
  77+ B461              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ B461              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ B461              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ B461              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ B461              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ B461              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ B461              ;--	ret
  84+ B461
  85+ B461              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ B461              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ B461              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ B461              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ B461              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ B461              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ B461              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ B461              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ B461              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ B461              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ B461              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ B461              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ B461              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ B461              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ B461              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ B461              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ B461              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ B461              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ B461              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ B461              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ B461              ;;;;	ret
 109+ B461              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ B461              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ B461              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ B461              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ B461              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ B461              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ B461              ;;;;	ret
 117+ B461              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ B461              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ B461              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ B461              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ B461              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ B461              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ B461              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ B461              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ B461              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ B461              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ B461              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ B461              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ B461              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ B461              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ B461              ;;;;	ret
 134+ B461              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ B461              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ B461              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ B461              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ B461              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ B461              ;;;;	ret
 141+ B461
 142+ B461
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
1204  B461                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ B461              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ B461              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ B461              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ B461
   5+ B461
   6+ B461              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ B461 3A 83 9B     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ B464 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ B465              moveship4breg:
  10+ B465              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ B465              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ B465              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ B465 3A AE 9B     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ B468 32 98 9C     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ B46B 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ B46E 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ B46F ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ B471 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ B472 32 99 9C     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ B475 23           		inc		hl
  21+ B476 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ B477 32 9A 9C     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ B47A 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ B47B 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ B47C 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ B47D 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y

  28+ B481 23           		inc		hl
  29+ B482 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ B483 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ B485 CD 66 AC     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ B488 23                   inc     hl
  33+ B489 23                   inc     hl

  35+ B48B 2B                   dec     hl

  37+ B48F 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ B490 32 95 9B             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ B493 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ B494 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ B495 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ B496 32 99 9C             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ B499 23                   inc     hl
  44+ B49A 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y

  47+ B49F 23                   inc     hl
  48+ B4A0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ B4A1 CD 66 AC             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ B4A4 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ B4A5 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ B4A6 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ B4A7 3A 82 9B             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ B4AA 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ B4AB 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment

  57+ B4AF 3A A0 9B             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ B4B2 32 98 9C             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ B4B5 23                   inc     hl
  60+ B4B6 23                   inc     hl
  61+ B4B7 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ B4B8 32 99 9C             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ B4BB 23                   inc     hl
  64+ B4BC 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ B4BD 32 9A 9C             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ B4C0 23                   inc     hl
  67+ B4C1 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ B4C2 32 95 9B             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ B4C5 23                   inc     hl
  70+ B4C6 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ B4C7 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ B4C9 CD 66 AC             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ B4CC 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ B4CD 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ B4CE 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ B4CF 3A 82 9B             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ B4D2 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ B4D3 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment

  81+ B4D8 23                   inc     hl

  84+ B4DD 23                   inc     hl

  88+ B4E3 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ B4E4 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y

1209  B4F1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B4F1              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B4F1              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B4F1              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B4F1              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B4F1              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B4F1              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B4F1              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B4F1              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B4F1              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B4F1              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B4F1              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B4F1              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B4F1              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B4F1              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B4F1              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B4F1              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B4F1              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B4F1              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B4F1              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B4F1              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B4F1              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B4F1              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B4F1              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B4F1              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B4F1              ;;;	ret
  34+ B4F1              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B4F1              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B4F1              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B4F1              ;;;	ret
  39+ B4F1
  40+ B4F1              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B4F1 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B4F2 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B4F3 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B4F5              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B4F5 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B4F6 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B4F7 C8             ret z
  48+ B4F8 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B4FB 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B4FD              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B4FD ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B4FF 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B500 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B502 C9             ret
  55+ B503
  56+ B503              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B503              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B503              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B503              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B503 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B505 AF                   xor a
  62+ B506              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B506 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B507 17                   rla
  65+ B508 B9                   cp c
  66+ B509 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B50B 91                   sub c
  68+ B50C 2C                   inc l
  69+ B50D              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B50D 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B50F 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B510 32 99 9C             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B513 C9                   ret
  74+ B514
  75+ B514
  76+ B514
  77+ B514              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B514              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B514              BFRDIV:
  80+ B514 F5           		push	af
  81+ B515 3A 98 9C     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B518 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B519 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B51A FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B51C CA 33 B5     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B51F              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B51F 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B521 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B522              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B522 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B524 AF           		xor a
  92+ B525              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B525 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B526 17           		rla
  95+ B527 B9           		cp c
  96+ B528 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B52A 2C           		inc l
  98+ B52B 91           		sub c
  99+ B52C              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B52C 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B52E 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B52F 32 99 9C     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B532 C9           		ret
 104+ B533              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B533 32 99 9C     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B536 C9           		ret
 107+ B537              ;	push	af
 108+ B537              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B537              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B537              ;	pop		af
 111+ B537              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B537              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B537              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B537              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B537              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B537              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B537              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B537              ;	sla		a
 119+ B537              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B537              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B537              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B537              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B537              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B537              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B537              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B537              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B537              ;	scf
 128+ B537              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B537              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B537              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B537              ;LL2:
 132+ B537              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B537              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B537              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B537              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B537              ;	ret

1210  B537                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B537              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B537              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B537              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B537 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B538 3A 98 9C     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B53B FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B53D 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B53F 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B540 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B542 AF               xor a
  11+ B543              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B543 CB 21            sla c
  13+ B545 17               rla
  14+ B546 BA               cp d
  15+ B547 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B549 0C               inc c
  17+ B54A 92               sub d
  18+ B54B              LL64:
  19+ B54B 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B54D 32 97 9C     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B550 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B551 32 99 9C     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B554 C9               ret
  24+ B555              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B555 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B557 32 99 9C     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B55A 32 97 9C     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B55D C9           	ret
  29+ B55E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   2+ B55E              RSequQmulA:
   3+ B55E              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ B55E CD 06 B4     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B561 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ B562 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ B563 32 9A 9C     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B566 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ B567 32 99 9C     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ B56A 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ B56B C9           	ret

   1++B56C              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:

   2++B56C 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)

  13++B592              CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15:
  14++B592                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX+1 ,XX15VecX
  14++B592 3A 16 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)
  14++B595 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
  15++B598                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevY+1, XX15VecY
  15++B598 3A 18 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)
  15++B59B 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
  16++B59E                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  16++B59E 3A 1A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)
  16++B5A1 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  17++B5A4 C9                   ret
  18++B5A5
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotMattoXX15.asm
  30+ B5A5
  31+ B5A5                  include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm
   1++B5A5              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
   2++B5A5                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
   2++B5A5 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   2++B5A8 32 22 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
   3++B5AB                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatNosevY+1
   3++B5AB 3A 84 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)

   9++B5BE                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1
   9++B5BE 3A 84 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)

  10++B5C4 3A 85 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecZ)
