  32+ B5DE
  33+ B5DE              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B5DE              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B5DE              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B5DE 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B5DF 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B5E0 32 98 9C     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B5E3 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B5E4 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B5E6 CD 66 AC     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B5E9              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B5E9              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B5E9              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B5E9 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B5EA E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B5EC 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B5ED 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B5EE E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B5F0 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B5F2              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B5F2 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B5F4              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B5F4 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B5F6 DA 03 B6    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B5F9 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B5FB 37           		scf
  56+ B5FC CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B5FE 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B600              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B600 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B601 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B602 C9           		ret
  62+ B603              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B603 B7           	or			a
  64+ B604 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B606 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B608 C3 00 B6     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B60B
  68+ B60B              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B60B              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B60B
  71+ B60B
  72+ B60B
  73+ B60B
  74+ B60B              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B60B CD 36 B7     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B60E 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B611 C3 47 B6     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B614
  79+ B614              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B614 AF           		xor		a
  81+ B615 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B616 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B619 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B61B CA 0B B6     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B61E 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B621 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B622 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B625 CD FC B6     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B628 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B62B C3 47 B6     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B62E              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B62E              TIDY:
  93+ B62E DD 01                break
  94+ B630              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B630              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B630 CD 6C B5     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B633 CD 13 B1     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B636 CD A5 B5     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B639              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B639 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B63C E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B63E CA 14 B6     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B641              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B641 CD C2 B6             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B644 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B647              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B647 CD 7F B5     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B64A CD 13 B1     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B64D              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B64D CD B8 B5     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B650 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B653 32 98 9C     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B656 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B659 CD 5E B5     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B65C 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B65F 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B660 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B663 CD DE B5     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B666                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B666 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B667 CA 6C B6    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B66A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B66C              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B66C 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B66F              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B66F 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B672 32 98 9C     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B675 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B678 CD 5E B5     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B67B 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B67E 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B67F 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B682 CD DE B5     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B685                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B685 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B686 CA 8B B6    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B689 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B68B              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B68B 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B68E              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B68E 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B691 32 98 9C     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B694 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B697 CD 5E B5     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B69A 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B69D 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B69E 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B6A1 CD DE B5     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B6A4                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B6A4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B6A5 CA AA B6    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B6A8 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B6AA              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B6AA 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B6AD              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B6AD 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B6B0 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B6B2 AF                   xor     a
 153+ B6B3              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B6B3 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B6B4 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B6B5 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B6B6 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B6B8 CD 92 B5     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B6BB CD 13 B1     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B6BE              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B6BE CD CB B5     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B6C1
 163+ B6C1 C9           		ret
 164+ B6C2
 165+ B6C2
 166+ B6C2
 167+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B6C2              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B6C2
 239+ B6C2
 240+ B6C2              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B6C2              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B6C2              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B6C2 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B6C5 32 98 9C    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B6C8 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B6CB CD 5E B5     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B6CE              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B6CE 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B6D1 32 98 9C    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B6D4 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B6D7 CD 66 AC     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B6DA 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B6DB E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B6DD FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B6DF              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B6DF 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B6E2 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B6E3 E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B6E5 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B6E7 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B6E9 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B6EA E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B6EC 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B6ED 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B6EE 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B6EF 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B6F1 CD 85 AF     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B6F4 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B6F6 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B6F8 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B6FA B0           		or		b
 268+ B6FB C9           		ret
 269+ B6FC
 270+ B6FC
 271+ B6FC              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B6FC              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B6FC              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B6FC 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B6FF 32 98 9C    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B702 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B705 CD 5E B5     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B708              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B708 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B70B 32 98 9C    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B70E 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B711 CD 66 AC     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B714 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B715 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B717 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B719 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B71C 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B71D E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B71F FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B721 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B723 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B724 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B726 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B727 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B728 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B729 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B72B CD 85 AF     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B72E FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B730 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B732 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B734 B0           		or		b
 298+ B735 C9           		ret
 299+ B736
 300+ B736              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B736              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B736              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B736 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B739 32 98 9C    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B73C 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B73F CD 5E B5     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B742              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B742 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B745 32 98 9C    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B748 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B74B CD 66 AC     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B74E 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B74F E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B751 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B753 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B756 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B757 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B759 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B75B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B75D 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B75E E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B760 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B761 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B762 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B763 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B765 CD 85 AF     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B768 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B76A EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B76C E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B76E B0           		or		b
 327+ B76F C9           		ret
 328+ B770
 329+ B770
 330+ B770
 331+ B770              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B770              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B770              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B770              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B770              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B770              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B770              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B770              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B770              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B770              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B770              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B770              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B770              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B770              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B770              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B770              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B770              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B770              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B770              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B770              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B770              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B770              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B770              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B770              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B770              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B770              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B770              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B770              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B770              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B770              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B770              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B770              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B770              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B770              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B770              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B770              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ B770
 377+ B770
 378+ B770
 379+ B770
 380+ B770
 381+ B770
 382+ B770              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B770              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ B770              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ B770              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 395+ B770
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1215  B770                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B770
   2+ B770              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B770 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B771 D2 8F B7    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B774 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B776 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B778 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B77A                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B77A BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B77B DA 80 B7    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B77E 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B77F                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B77F B7          >                        or a
   9+ B780 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B781 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B783 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B785 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B786 C9                                   ret
  14+ B787 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ B788 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ B789 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ B78B 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ B78D 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ B78E C9                                   ret
  20+ B78F 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ B791 C9                                   ret
  22+ B792
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1216  B792                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ B792              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ B792              TIS1:
   3+ B792 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ B793 3A 82 9B     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ B796 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ B797 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ B798              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ B798 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ B799 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ B79A 32 98 9C     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ B79D 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ B79E EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ B7A0 CD 66 AC     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ B7A3              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ B7A3              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ B7A3              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ B7A3 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ B7A4 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ B7A6 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ B7A7 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ B7A8 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ B7AA 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ B7AC 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ B7AD              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ B7AD CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ B7AF FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ B7B1 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ B7B3 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ B7B5              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ B7B5 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ B7B7 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ B7B9 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ B7BA B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ B7BB C9           		ret
  35+ B7BC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

# file opened: ./Tactics.asm
   1+ B7BC              ;Ship Tactics
   2+ B7BC              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
   3+ B7BC
   4+ B7BC
   5+ B7BC              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
   6+ B7BC 3A 23 C3     MakeAngry:              ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
   7+ B7BF                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbAngry
   7+ B7BF 3A 22 C3    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
   7+ B7C2 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
   7+ B7C4 CA E7 B7    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbAngry
   8+ B7C7 E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
   9+ B7C9 C4 ED B7                             call    nz, SetStationAngry                     ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
  10+ B7CC 3A 37 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
  11+ B7CF                                      ReturnIfAIsZero                                 ; if 0 then no AI attached
  11+ B7CF A7          >                        and     a
  11+ B7D0 C8          >                        ret     z
  12+ B7D1 F6 80                                or      ShipAIEnabled                           ; set AI Enabled set to ensure its set
  13+ B7D3 32 37 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                        ; .
  14+ B7D6 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
  15+ B7D7                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
  15+ B7D7 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
  15+ B7D9 32 32 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
  16+ B7DC CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
  17+ B7DE 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
  18+ B7E1 3A 24 C3                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  19+ B7E4                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
  19+ B7E4 E6 01       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
  19+ B7E6 C8          >                        ret     z
  20+ B7E7 CD 2E CA     .SetNewbAngry:          call    SetShipHostile
  21+ B7EA C9                                   ret
  22+ B7EB
  23+ B7EB C9           MissileDidHitUs:        ret ; TODO
  24+ B7EC

  26+ B7ED
  27+ B7ED CD 3A A1     SetStationAngry:        call    IsSpaceStationPresent                   ; only if present
  28+ B7F0 D8                                   ret     c
  29+ B7F1 3A 2C C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
  30+ B7F4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  31+ B7F6                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
  31+ B7F6 ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
  32+ B7FA CD 2E CA                             call    SetShipHostile
  33+ B7FD FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
  34+ B7FF                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
  34+ B7FF C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
  34+ B801 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  35+ B804 C9                                   ret
  36+ B805
  37+ B805              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
  37+ B805 AF          >                        xor a
  38+ B806 32 67 9D                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
  39+ B809 21 0C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
  40+ B80C 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
  41+ B80F 11 35 9D                             ld      de,MissileXPos
  42+ B812 ED B0                                ldir
  43+ B814                                      ZeroA                                   ; we have processd enque request
  43+ B814 AF          >                        xor a
  44+ B815 32 2F C0                             ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a      ;
  45+ B818 CD D5 B8                             call    CheckIfBlastHitUs               ; If we are in Range
  46+ B81B DC EB B7                             call    c, MissileDidHitUs              ; Then we get hit
  47+ B81E C9                                   ret
  48+ B81F
  49+ B81F              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
  50+ B81F ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
  51+ B81F ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
  52+ B81F ~                                    xor     (hl)
  53+ B81F ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  54+ B81F ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
  55+ B81F ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
  56+ B81F ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  57+ B81F ~            .XSame:                 and     a
  58+ B81F ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  59+ B81F ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  60+ B81F ~                                    NegHL
  61+ B81F ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
  62+ B81F ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  63+ B81F ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
  64+ B81F ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
  65+ B81F ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
  66+ B81F ~                                    ld      a,l
  67+ B81F ~                                    and     a
  68+ B81F ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
  69+ B81F                                      ENDM
  70+ B81F              ;...................................................................
  71+ B81F              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
  72+ B81F 3A 67 9D     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
  73+ B822                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
  73+ B822 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
  73+ B824 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  74+ B825 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
  75+ B827 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
  76+ B828 32 67 9D                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
  77+ B82B                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
  77+ B82B 21 69 9D    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  77+ B82E ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
  77+ B830 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  77+ B831 3C          >                        inc     a
  77+ B832 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  77+ B833 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  78+ B834 CD 3A A1                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
  79+ B837 D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic
  80+ B838 3A 35 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; Don't explode a ship twice
  81+ B83B E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ;
  82+ B83D                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
  82+ B83D C0          >                        ret     nz
  83+ B83E 3A 56 9D                             ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastRange)
  84+ B841 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ; iyh = missile blast depending on type
  85+ B843 FD 7D        .CheckRange:            ld      a,iyl                               ; now page in universe data
  86+ B845                                      MMUSelectUniverseA
  86+ B845 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
  86+ B847 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  87+ B84A                                      CheckPointRange UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn, MissileXPos, MissileXSgn  ; its a square but its good enough
  87+ B84A 3A 35 9D    >                        ld      a,(MissileXPos)                      ; check X Coord
  87+ B84D 2A 0E C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxsgn)
  87+ B850 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
  87+ B851 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ B853 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  87+ B856 ED 5B 35 9D >                        ld      de,(MissileXPos)
  87+ B85A 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  87+ B85C A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
  87+ B85D ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  87+ B85F             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  87+ B85F F2 6D B8    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
  87+ B862             >                        NegHL
  87+ B862 AF          >                    xor a
  87+ B863 95          >                    sub l
  87+ B864 6F          >                    ld l,a
  87+ B865 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  87+ B866 94          >                    sub h
  87+ B867 67          >                    ld h,a
  87+ B868 C3 6D B8    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
  87+ B86B 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  87+ B86C             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
  87+ B86C F8          >                        ret     m
  87+ B86D 7C          >.CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
  87+ B86E             >                        ReturnIfANotZero
  87+ B86E A7          >                        and     a
  87+ B86F C0          >                        ret     nz
  87+ B870 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  87+ B871 A7          >                        and     a
  87+ B872             >                        ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
  87+ B872 21 56 9D    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
  87+ B875 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
  87+ B876 D0          >                        ret	    nc
  88+ B877                                      CheckPointRange UBnKylo, UBnKysgn, MissileYPos, MissileYSgn
  88+ B877 3A 38 9D    >                        ld      a,(MissileYPos)                      ; check X Coord
  88+ B87A 2A 11 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKysgn)
  88+ B87D AE          >                        xor     (hl)
  88+ B87E E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  88+ B880 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  88+ B883 ED 5B 38 9D >                        ld      de,(MissileYPos)
  88+ B887 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  88+ B889 A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
  88+ B88A ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  88+ B88C             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  88+ B88C F2 9A B8    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
  88+ B88F             >                        NegHL
  88+ B88F AF          >                    xor a
  88+ B890 95          >                    sub l
  88+ B891 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ B892 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ B893 94          >                    sub h
  88+ B894 67          >                    ld h,a
  88+ B895 C3 9A B8    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
  88+ B898 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  88+ B899             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
  88+ B899 F8          >                        ret     m

  88+ B89B             >                        ReturnIfANotZero

   2+ B970              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ B970              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ B970              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ B970              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ B970              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ B970
   8+ B970              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ B970              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ B970              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ B970
  12+ B970              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  13+ B970              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  14+ B970 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  14+ B974 DD E5
  15+ B976 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  16+ B977 CF                                   rst	    $08
  17+ B978 89                                   db	    $89
  18+ B979 32 83 B9                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  19+ B97C DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  19+ B980 C1 F1
  20+ B982 C9                                   ret
  21+ B983 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  22+ B984
  23+ B984              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  24+ B984              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  25+ B984              ;	In:		ix = filename
  26+ B984              ;			b  = Open filemode
  27+ B984              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  28+ B984              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  29+ B984 E5           fOpen:	                push	hl
  30+ B985 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  31+ B988 3A 83 B9                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  32+ B98B CF                                   rst	    $08
  33+ B98C 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  34+ B98D E1                                   pop	    hl
  35+ B98E C9                                   ret
  36+ B98F
  37+ B98F              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  38+ B98F              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  39+ B98F              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  40+ B98F              ;			bc  = amount to read
  41+ B98F              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  42+ B98F              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  43+ B98F B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  44+ B990 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  45+ B991 E5                                   push    hl
  46+ B992 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  47+ B995 CF                                   rst	    $08
  48+ B996 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  49+ B997 E1                                   pop	    hl
  50+ B998 C9                                   ret
  51+ B999
  52+ B999              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  53+ B999              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  54+ B999              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  55+ B999              ;			bc  = amount to read
  56+ B999              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  57+ B999              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  58+ B999 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  59+ B99A C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  60+ B99B E5                                   push	hl
  61+ B99C DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix

  63+ B9A0 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  64+ B9A1 E1                                   pop	    hl
  65+ B9A2 C9                                   ret

  71+ B9A3              ; *******************************************************************************************************

  78+ B9A8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ B9A8              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  80+ B9A8              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  81+ B9A8              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  82+ B9A8              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  83+ B9A8              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  84+ B9A8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  85+ B9A8 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  86+ B9AB CF                                   rst	    $08
  87+ B9AC 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  88+ B9AD E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  89+ B9B0 C9                                   ret
  90+ B9B1
  91+ B9B1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ B9B1              ; Init the file system
  93+ B9B1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  94+ B9B1 CD 70 B9     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  95+ B9B4 C9                                   ret
  96+ B9B5
  97+ B9B5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  98+ B9B5              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  99+ B9B5              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 100+ B9B5              ;		    ix = address to load to
 101+ B9B5              ;           bc = filelength
 102+ B9B5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 103+ B9B5 CD 70 B9     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 104+ B9B8 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 105+ B9BB                                      ; get file size
 106+ B9BB C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 107+ B9BE E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 108+ B9C1 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 109+ B9C3 CD 84 B9                             call    fOpen
 110+ B9C6 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 111+ B9C8 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 112+ B9CA 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 113+ B9CC DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 114+ B9CF F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 115+ B9D0 CD 8F B9                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 116+ B9D3 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 117+ B9D5 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 118+ B9D6 CD A3 B9                             call	fClose			; close file
 119+ B9D9 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 120+ B9DB F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 121+ B9DE C9                                   ret
 122+ B9DF              ;
 123+ B9DF              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 124+ B9DF              ;
 125+ B9DF DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 126+ B9E1 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 127+ B9E2
 128+ B9E2              .error_closing:
 129+ B9E2 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 130+ B9E3 D1                                   pop	de
 131+ B9E4 C1                                   pop	bc
 132+ B9E5 C9                                   ret
 133+ B9E6
 134+ B9E6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 135+ B9E6              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 136+ B9E6              ; In:		hl = file name
 137+ B9E6              ;		    ix = address to save from
 138+ B9E6              ;		    bc = size
 139+ B9E6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 140+ B9E6 CD 70 B9     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 141+ B9E9 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 142+ B9EC E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 143+ B9EF 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 144+ B9F1 CD 84 B9                             call    fOpen
 145+ B9F4 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 146+ B9F6 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 147+ B9F8 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 148+ B9FA DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 149+ B9FD F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 150+ B9FE CD 99 B9                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 151+ BA01 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 152+ BA03 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 153+ BA04 CD A3 B9                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 154+ BA07 C9           .error:                 ret
 155+ BA08              ;
 156+ BA08              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 157+ BA08              ;
 158+ BA08 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 159+ BA0B C9                                   ret
 160+ BA0C
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  17+ BAB9              txt_status_colour		equ $FF
  18+ BAB9
  19+ BAB9              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ BAB9              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ BAB9              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ BAB9 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ BABA 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ BABB 23           	inc			hl
  25+ BABC 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ BABD 23           	inc			hl
  27+ BABE 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ BABF 23           	inc			hl
  29+ BAC0 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ BAC1 23           	inc			hl
  31+ BAC2 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ BAC3 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ BAC4 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ BAC6                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ BAC6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ BACA CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ BACD E1           	pop			hl
  37+ BACE C1           	pop			bc
  38+ BACF 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ BAD1 C9           	ret
  40+ BAD2
  41+ BAD2
  42+ BAD2              print_boiler_text:
  43+ BAD2              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ BAD2              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ BAD2 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ BAD3 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ BAD4 23           	inc			hl
  48+ BAD5 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ BAD6 23           	inc			hl
  50+ BAD7 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ BAD8 23           	inc			hl
  52+ BAD9 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ BADA 23           	inc			hl
  54+ BADB E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ BADC EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ BADD 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ BADF C5           	push		bc
  58+ BAE0 D1           	pop			de
  59+ BAE1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ BAE4 E1           	pop			hl
  61+ BAE5 C1           	pop			bc
  62+ BAE6 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ BAE8 C9           	ret

# file opened: ./Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm
   1++BAE9
   2++BAE9
   3++BAE9 3A 72 A1     	ld		a,(Fuel)
   4++BAEC 11 97 BA     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++BAEF 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++BAF1 CD FB BA     	call	.Num1
   7++BAF4 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++BAF6 CD FB BA     	call	.Num1
   9++BAF9 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++BAFB              .Num1:
  11++BAFB 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++BAFD              .Num2:
  13++BAFD 04           	inc		b
  14++BAFE 81           	add		a,c
  15++BAFF 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++BB01 91           	sub 	c
  17++BB02 C5           	push	bc
  18++BB03 F5           	push	af
  19++BB04 79           	ld		a,c
  20++BB05 FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++BB07 CC 10 BB     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++BB0A 78           	ld		a,b
  23++BB0B 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++BB0C 13           	inc		de
  25++BB0D F1           	pop		af
  26++BB0E C1           	pop		bc
  27++BB0F C9           	ret
  28++BB10              .InsertDot:
  29++BB10 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++BB12 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++BB13 13           	inc		de
  32++BB14 C9           	ret

  66+ BB15
  67+ BB15 2A 6E A1     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ BB18 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ BB19 DD 2A 70 A1                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ BB1D FD 21 A8 BA                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ BB21 CD A5 B2                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ BB24 FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ BB27 32 B4 BA                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ BB2A 21 A9 BA     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ BB2D 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ BB2E FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ BB30 C8                                   ret		z
  78+ BB31 FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ BB35 C9                                   ret

   1++C0C2

   3++C0C2              .BoilerTextLoop:

   5++C0C3 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C0C4 23           	inc			hl
   7++C0C5 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b

  48+ C0F9 ED 4B A2 9D                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  49+ C0FD ED 5B A0 9D                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  50+ C101 0E 80                                ld		c,src_x_centre
  51+ C103 06 60                                ld		b,src_y_centre
  52+ C105                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
  52+ C105 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE

  56+ C10D 3A 8D 9D     src_get_name:           ld      a,(Galaxy)
  57+ C110                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
  57+ C110 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  58+ C113 ED 4B A2 9D                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
  59+ C117 ED 43 5B E8                          ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc
  60+ C11B CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor
  61+ C11E FE 00                                cp      0
  62+ C120 C8                                   ret     z
  63+ C121 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
  64+ C124 21 09 AA                             ld		hl,name_expanded
  65+ C127 CD 64 A9                             call	CapitaliseString
  66+ C12A 21 09 AA                             ld		hl, name_expanded
  67+ C12D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  68+ C12F C9                                   ret
  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B A2 9D                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B A0 9D                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 102+ C16C CD D0 E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 104+ C172 C9                                   ret
 105+ C173
 106+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8
 107+ C175 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 108+ C178 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 109+ C17B E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 110+ C17C D5                                   push    de
 111+ C17D C5                                   push    bc
 112+ C17E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 112+ C17E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 113+ C182 CD 8A E2                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 114+ C185 C1                                   pop     bc
 115+ C186 D1                                   pop     de
 116+ C187 E1                                   pop     hl
 117+ C188 04                                   inc     b
 118+ C189 25                                   dec     h
 119+ C18A 20 EF                                jr      nz,.ClearLoop
 120+ C18C C9                                   ret
 121+ C18D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ C18D 3A 8D 9D     src_system_undercursor: ld      a,(Galaxy)
 123+ C190                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 123+ C190 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 124+ C193 ED 4B A2 9D                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 125+ C197 ED 43 5B E8                          ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc
 126+ C19B CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor

 128+ C1A0 C8                                   ret     z
 129+ C1A1 CD 0D C1     src_name_current:       call    src_get_name
 130+ C1A4 FE 00                                cp      0
 131+ C1A6 C8                                   ret     z
 132+ C1A7 E5                                   push    hl
 133+ C1A8 F5                                   push    af
 134+ C1A9 CD 73 C1                             call    src_clear_name_area
 135+ C1AC F1                                   pop     af
 136+ C1AD E1                                   pop     hl
 137+ C1AE 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 138+ C1B1 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 139+ C1B3                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 139+ C1B3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 140+ C1B7 CD F9 E1                             call	l2_print_7at
 141+ C1BA CD CD C1                             call    src_calc_distance
 142+ C1BD 21 1A C0                             ld      hl,src_distance
 143+ C1C0 01 0A B0                             ld      bc,$B00A
 144+ C1C3 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 145+ C1C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 145+ C1C5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 146+ C1C9 CD F9 E1                             call	l2_print_7at
 147+ C1CC C9                                   ret
 148+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 149+ C1CD 3A 8D 9D     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B A0 9D                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B A2 9D                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 29 9D                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD A5 B2                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD C9 B0                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD C9 B0                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD C9 B0                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD 0B A2     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A 8D 9D                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 256+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 257+ C2BF 21 09 AA                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 258+ C2C2 CD 64 A9                             call	CapitaliseString
 259+ C2C5 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 260+ C2C8 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 263+ C2CE C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 264+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 266+ C2D3 21 09 AA                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 267+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 268+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl
 269+ C2D8 1C                                   inc     e
 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 271+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 272+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 274+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b
 287+ C2F6 D6 10                                sub     16
 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz
 294+ C301 1E FF        .OKToPrint:             ld		e,$FF
 295+ C303 21 09 AA                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 296+ C306                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 296+ C306 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 297+ C30A CD F9 E1                             call	l2_print_7at
 298+ C30D C9                                   ret

 300+ C30E              name_if_possible:
 301+ C30E 3A 18 C0     SRCpixelRowToRefRow:    ld		a,(local_name_row)
 302+ C311 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 303+ C313 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 304+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a
 305+ C316 CB 3F                                srl		a
 306+ C318 CB 3F                                srl		a					; divide by 8 to get character row
 307+ C31A                                  ;	sub		2					; don;t write over header TODO tweaks
 308+ C31A 21 5E 9C                             ld		hl,IndexedWork
 309+ C31D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 310+ C31F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 311+ C320 FE 00                                cp		0
 312+ C322 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryAbove		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 313+ C324 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 314+ C326 18 12                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 315+ C328 2B           SRCtryAbove:            dec		hl
 316+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 317+ C32A FE 00                                cp		0
 318+ C32C 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryBelow		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 319+ C32E 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 320+ C330 18 08                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 321+ C332 23           SRCtryBelow:            inc		hl
 322+ C333 23                                   inc		hl
 323+ C334 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 324+ C335 FE 00                                cp		0
 325+ C337 C8                                   ret		z
 326+ C338 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 327+ C33A CD 0B A2     SRCFoundRow:            call	copy_system_to_working

 334+ C34F 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 335+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y

 337+ C355 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)

 361+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 362+ C38F 3A A1 9D     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)

 364+ C393 79                                   ld		a,c
 365+ C394 90                                   sub		b
 366+ C395 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 367+ C397 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedy
 368+ C399 ED 44        SRCnegativedy:          neg
 369+ C39B FE 26        SRCpositivedy:          cp		local_max_range_y
 370+ C39D 30 48                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 371+ C39F 3A 87 9C     SRCcalcLocaldx:         ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 372+ C3A2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 373+ C3A3 3A A0 9D                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 374+ C3A6 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 375+ C3A7 79                                   ld		a,c
 376+ C3A8 90                                   sub		b
 377+ C3A9 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 378+ C3AB 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedx
 379+ C3AD ED 44        SRCnegativedx:          neg
 380+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x
 381+ C3B1 30 34                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 382+ C3B3 3A 85 9C     SRCOKToPlot             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
 383+ C3B6 21 A1 9D                             ld		hl,PresentSystemY
 384+ C3B9 96                                   sub		(hl)
 385+ C3BA CB 27                                sla		a								; * 2
 386+ C3BC C6 60                                add		src_y_centre
